Not to worry, I have looped our team to make sure that each area of concern is addressed accordingly.  Despite the inconvenience, we hope that you can give us another opportunity to host your stay again.    Best,  Ronald R. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: We've stayed at this hotel twice in the span of maybe 30 days. The first stay was actually really good. Great location for what we were doing in San Clemente, clean, good breakfast options in the time of Covid, and an overall pleasant experience. The second stay, not so much.   The second stay we were there for two nights. The first night our daughter mentioned seeing ants in the bathroom which I then confirmed myself. The following morning it was mentioned to the front desk and we were told they would spray to take care of it while we were out for the day. After returning late after a long day of skateboarding and beach time we noticed nothing was really done. In fact the ants in the bathroom seemed to be worse. At this point the kids needed to sleep and we weren't about to
Manager Response: Hi BoardintheWorld,  Thank you for taking your time to write a review because this is one of the ways that let us know where we need to improve.   While we're glad to hear you liked our location and enjoyed your first stay, I am sorry your recent stay with us didn't match your expectations due to the issue with the ants in the bathroom. This certainly isn't what we want for any of our guests. Your comments will not go unnoticed as I have shared them with our management teams to be addressed internally.  Again, thanks for staying with us. We value your input, and welcome the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.  Sincerely,  Connie D Case Manager IHGService

Summary: We’ve been traveling for 3 weeks and this was our best night sleep.  Open free parking.  Luggage trolleys to assist us with all our luggage.  Checkin was a breeze.  Room was sanitized and ready for us.  We used a third party booking and as always given a room at the very end of al hall but that didn’t matter because we found the room to have actual queen size beds.  Many (and I mean 5 hotels offered 2 double beds or a king). This was also the first hotel to offer a breakfast, limited but appreciated.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Love this hotel for our Scrapbook Retreats
Summary: Scrappin' Escapes really enjoys having their event at the Holiday Inn Express in San Clemente. We had 46 ladies that came to craft, stay, relax, shop and eat at all the great restaurants in town . I'd like to thank Ernie for taking care of our group during the renovation to ensure our guest were satisfied. The new room's are beautiful with comfortable beds. We loved having a Keurig machine in our room.Thank you to James for your kindness and help with requests we had. Its always a pleasure to see Guzy who is always so welcoming. Thank you to Brenna in sales who was able to take care of our group for a few years. The breakfast is good and gives you good choices.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This HI express is undergoing renovation, so for the moment it is a little tired. Our room was large and very clean, but it could certainly do with freshening up. It didn’t help that there was a herd of elephants staying in the room directly above us, gosh how much noise can someone make - a lot! The tv also had some issues, it would intermittently mute itself. All in all a good stay, great value, and I would imagine this will be an exceptional property when the make over had been completed.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice place to call home for the night
Summary: On a recent trip we stayed at here and it was a perfect location for our needs. The hotel is well maintained and very clean. The staff was very friendly and helpful. We loved the look of the building as it looks like a California Mission. They have a nice outdoor fireplace to enjoy on a cool night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: For less than a hundred bucks I was impressed. Immaculate grounds,spacious room, comfortable bed, small gym, really good pizza below the hotel in shopping plaza, larger breakfast layout than the usual. Beach & shopping only a few minutes away. No complaints here!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Pros:  Safe, clean, quiet. A new hotel - pretty to look at also - Spanish Style. Pool is warm and central. Although pets are allowed, they are only on lower floor (of three floors). Staff very cooperative in moving this person due to loud children in nearby room. Walking distance or short drive if steep access too much, to Pizza and Pho restaurants,  and 2 discount stores for any necessary sundries. Beds excellent. Cons: Bit difficult to find.... follow GPS exactly!  Go to END of Via Pico Plaza and turn right. Trust me!  Drive along edge of parking behind Pho Restuarant and UP the steep incline. There it is !  Doors are bit thin - therefore if near elevator or next to noisy neighbors, change rooms ! All in all - a good reasonable choice. It is 30 miles to the Pageant of the
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your most recent visit. We will share your comments with the hotel staff. We do want to apologize that you had trouble located the hotel, it is a bit tricky, but glad you were able to locate us and had a pleasant stay.

Summary: I love the feel of the hotel, the staff was attentive and breakfast was great. Thank you for a wonderful experience. Convenient location with lots to do at walking distance. I would definitely stay here when in San Clemente.
Manager Response: Delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent visit at the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente. I will share your comments with the staff. We hope you will visit us back soon. Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor.

Summary: If you don’t want to spend a lot and you are not looking for frills then this place is fine. Clean, pool, free breakfast all pluses. Behind a strip mall, no view, a bit dated interior minuses. Nothing special, I didn’t feel like I was in Southern California more like Indiana (actually, the Holiday Inn Express in Gas City, Indiana is very nice).
Manager Response: Hi Latoundji,  Thanks for choosing us among your many hotel options, and for letting us know about your experience.   We aim to continue being your top hotel choice where you can have a simple, engaging place to rest and recharge, and I am glad that you found our hotel clean, the pool nice. It's also great that you were satisfied with our breakfast offerings. I am so sorry though to learn that your stay was just average due to the limited room view, along with some dated interiors.  Positive guest experience is something our entire hotel staff takes great pride in. We just regret that we didn't exceed your expectations. Perhaps next time, we'd be able to provide you an experience that aligns with the many 5-star reviews that we receive regularly. Hope to see you soon!  Best,  Kenneth F Case Manager IHGService

Summary: The place is outside downtown San Clemente , but it is a very good option to stay in San Clemente not spending fortune . 30 min walk to beaches . Close to supermarket. The place is clean and use to have space to stay outside .
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I have stayed at this hotel so many times I have lost count. This year we decided to bring our family of 8 to stay at our favorite place! Guzy as always treats us like we are family. Her customer service goes above and beyond. The whole staff is really just amazing. The location is close to so many restaurants, shops, and the beautiful beach. The hotel is sparkling clean, the best service and the just beautiful. Can’t wait for our next trip!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Location, Friendly Staff, Clean Room
Summary: I don't know that I've ever stayed in a Holiday Inn Express before but I was pleased with the value I received.  The room was very clean and the bed was comfortable. The location was excellent--only a few minutes drive from the beach. Even though it is next to the freeway, I heard no freeway sounds--my room was quiet.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The other people at hotel seemed happy including families with children. There is a small pool that was very popular.  Plenty of parking out front and parking is free. Breakfast--well, it was pretty awful with processed cheese omelets and terrible bread options.  Just choose cereal and yogurt and you 'll be happy.  Overall a good value for the price I paid ($89/night).
Manager Response: Dear Sara, Delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent visit to the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente. Our summer months are very busy with families visiting the area and not to mention the San Clemente Beach that is only 1 mile from the hotel. We apologize for the breakfast and not having other options. We will take note of your comments and explore other options for our complimentary breakfast buffet. We hope you will visit us back soon!

Summary: I can’t say enough about my recent experience at this hotel.  We were traveling and had no reservation for the night when we found this hotel.  We took a chance  and went in to see if they had any rooms available and while they didn’t have any at the moment, the manager suggested that I leave my name and number with him and if something came up he would call me.  Several hours later and as we were becoming desperate to find somewhere to stay, the phone rang and it was the front desk clerk telling me Ernie asked her to call me, they just had a cancellation!  So grateful!!! In addition, the rate was so a great, hotel clean and comfortable and a great breakfast!  We will be back for sure!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Jackie,  We are pleased to have been able to accommodate your recent visit at San Clemente. Yes, it was a very busy weekend and most of the hotels in the area had no availability. We kept you number and consistently looked at our availability and found a cancellation and we reached out to you asap. Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We hope we can serve you in the near future.

Summary: The hotel was clean. The staff were great. San Clemente is a great place to escape to for a relaxing fun time. This hotel was very nice to stay. The breakfast is a great added bonus. Good coffee and plenty of options for picky kids. The pool is small and needs an update. Great outdoor fire pit to relax and read.
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl- Thank you so much for posting your  review on Tripadvisor. We do our best to make every guest feel at home. I am delighted to hear you did enjoyed our various complimentary amenities and glad you enjoyed our outdoor fire place. Regarding the outdoor heated pool, let us see what options we have to make our pool more inviting. We value your comments and strive to further improve the guest experience. Thank you once again for sharing your recent visit at the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente.

Summary: It’s often we hear about the bad things in business , but I do have to say this review is for sure not a bad thing. I have to say from the minute we walked in and was greeted by Esmeralda and then taken care of later by Chris 1, Chris 2, and Guzy our experience here has been nothing short of amazing. The hospitality of your team and even your cleaning crew is not like any other. We have to stay in hotels often and this has by far exceeded our expectations and has set the bar so high. I honestly want to thank you from my families and my heart. Thank you so much for having such a amazing crew and a clean family friendly beautiful hotel!! You guys rock
Manager Response: Thank you Sonjia for the wonderful review on Tripadvisor. I appreciate you acknowledging my staff efforts. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary Heading: You will hear every step the person above you takes
Summary: This would have been a 1 star review if not for the professionalism and courtesy of Chris.  We specifically requested a top floor room as I suspected the sound proofing between floors would be inadequate. Unfortunately, because we were traveling with a small dog we were required to stay on the bottom floor. Please note, our pet is an ESA and we carry the documentation. Therefore, legally all rooms on all floors should be made available to us. Unfortunately, I didn’t make that an issue upon checking in. Very predictably we were awoken by the sounds of the person above checking in at 2:47 AM. He or she proceeded to inexplicably stomp back and forth for the next four hours until we finally gave up and left the room. Later that day the front desk assured us that guest had check out
Manager Response: Hello Andrew,  Please accept our sincere apology for the unpleasant stay you recently experienced. I will share your review with our staff and address your concerns. Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor.

Summary: Very accommodating with nice rooms and service. Staff was friendly and even changed our room for different size bed without complaint. The cleaning staff kept everything spotless and neat. We will definitely use them again.
Manager Response: Thank you Linette for posting your on Tripadvisor. Wonder to hear you enjoyed your recent visit.

Summary: The stay at this hotel was good since everything was clean but more importantly the Staff was always nice, friendly and willing to help my stay comfortable.  Breakfast included.  Breakfast area is a little small for the amount of tables they want to accommodate but breakfast is good. I will go back to this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you Lita for posting your recent visit on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay. I will share your comments with the team. We hope you will return and visit us back soon.

Summary: This HIE was a pleasant surprise -- the best one that we have ever stayed in! We were coming from Cardiff-By-The Sea where we also stayed in a HIE -- the San Clemente hotel was significantly better.  My wife, who  had made the reservation, was selected to be their member of the week and received 5,000 points, a $10 credit in their (little) market, a greeting card, and an energy bar.  Here's what we liked about this hotel: *Very friendly check-in. *Spacious room with a very comfortable bed and a choice of soft or firm pillows. * In addition to an office chair, there was a chair for sitting and a couch. *Wi-Fi worked very well in room. *Fitness Center had nice equipment. *Breakfast options for everyone. *Spanish-style building.  What we did not like: *The hotel is located on a
Manager Response: I can't say it enough VeganChela. THANK YOU for acknowledging our service staff and our complimentary amenities. Our staff takes great pride in delivering a memorial experience to all our guests especially IHG Members.  I will share your comments with our team, they will be very excited to hear you and your wife had a wonderful experience at the Holiday Inn Express San Clement.    We hope you will visit us back soon!

Summary Heading: Stay only on the highest floor
Summary: This is a very nice hotel in beautiful San Clemente. The location is hard to figure, especially after Sunset, owing to very poor lighting in the areas where directions are put up.   The hotel is clean, bathroom big enough, microwave and refrigerator in room, 24 hour coffee in the lobby, decent breakfast. The major problem with this place is that the walls are paper thin. Unless you get to stay on the highest floor, you can hardly sleep. I am a very light sleeper and I had a tough time sleeping because of the continuous noise from the room/ hallway right above my room. There was a lot of noise even after 2 AM. I was in the second floor.  I would recommend staying here provided you get a room on the highest floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and posting your review on Tripadvisor. We value your comments and will further visit the topics mentioned. We are delighted you enjoyed our spacious rooms and the many complimentary amenities we offer at the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente. I am excited to share with you that our guestrooms will be soon going through a full renovation and will be addressing the wall noise. Once again, thank you for staying with us and sharing your recent visit.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel in a lovely area
Summary: San Clemente is a fun, beautiful place and this HIX was a nice place to stay.  Located close to I-5, but you barely hear any traffic noise.  A couple of miles from the beach.  Room are the usual, clean and comfortable.  Nice king bed with a great mattress.  The constant fan is great from creating “white noise” for a good night’s sleep.  Water pressure in the sink was poor, but the shower was fine.  Breakfast was the same as all HIX and is a good way to get something quick on your way out.  I enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: Delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit at the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente. Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. I will share your comments with the team. We hope you will return and visit us back soon!

Summary: A no frills functional place to spend the night.  A very odd steep uphill  location in the corner of a fairly large shopping plaza.  Don't expect any scenic views despite its elevated San Clemente location and the free way roars audibly by within hearing distance.  However, the hotel is clean, staff courteous and all the usual amenities--microwave, coffee maker, wifi etc.--are in place and working.  The breakfast which is included is a notch above airline food: serviceable, bland and assembly line fare with nothing to offer anyone with special dietary needs or preference.  Three restaurants plus a scattering of stores and offices make up the Pico Plaza complex. The immediate surroundings are definitely not very interesting and it is a bit of a drive to the beaches and better
Manager Response: Hello Pat, Thank you for sharing your most recent visit at the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente. I love when guests take time and express their views and experiences. It is true our location is on a hill behind a large shopping center, there are various restaurants and boutique shops but only a short drive away. We are delighted to hear you found your room clean and comfortable and that our staff was courteous during your overnight visit. I am sorry you did not enjoy the various complimentary breakfast items, we are working on offering more dietary food items soon.  Once again, thank you for your detailed review. Will share with my team your Tripadvisor review.

Summary Heading: Clean room and decent free breakfast
Summary: Very clean all around. Breakfast was more simpler than other Holiday Inn Expresses(at least in appearance). But still a decent breakfast considering it is free.  Beach is 5min drive. Good WiFi. Clean pool. No hot tub or steam room.  Right off the highway, but sort of hidden behind a strip mall, located up a long driveway.  No higher end dining options in walking distance, maybe even in short driving distance. Several fast food options in walking distance. Dollar store in walking distance. I believe the hotel has no dining options other than breakfast.  Great option just to have a good clean bed. I used this place as a overnight sleeping option while driving thru CA. Always been happy with Holiday Inn Express locations.
Manager Response: Delighted to hear your enjoyed your recent visit to the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente. I will share your comments to the staff and thank you for posting your review of Tripadvisor.

Summary: A little like Hotel California, and in symmetry with the white adobe look that is generally about San Clemente, and its ghostly location, not your average set up. Would not be surprised if some friendly ghosts were up and about during foggy nights, but we will be staying in our room, thank you. Being San Clemente, the sea is one, if not the main attraction, but this Holiday Inn is located  right by the fast freeway. Rooms were adequate, bathroom tightly small, TV 40 inches, but fast tracking, with the surprisingly smooth remote. 299 square feet, two queen beds according to what is said. The unexpected, and welcome surprise were the pillows. Something about them, according to the ladies with me. Pillowy pillows. AC worked, but seen better years. San Clemente, in general, very
Manager Response: Thank you Luke for your detailed review of the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente. We can tell you are a savvy traveler. Would like to share with you that our guestrooms will be going under a full renovation very soon. We hope you will return and visit us back soon and provide your expert advise and suggestions.

Summary: We stopped in San Clemente for two nights in mid-September on our drive to San Diego.  The hotel is nicely located for sight seeing and visiting Camp Pendleton.  The hotel is very comfortable and clean, as was our room, comfortable bed and spacious room. We enjoyed our stay and will stay here again when we're visiting the area. The parking is convenient and the staff were friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Delighted to hear your enjoyed your recent visit. Thank you for sharing your experience on Tripadvisor. We hope you will return and visit us back soon!

Summary: This hotel is an excellent value for your money! The hotel room is sparkling clean with very comfortable bed, balcony and a nice desk. There is a really nice small gym, pool and the morning buffet is one of the best I have experienced! There are a few restaurants that are within walking distance and a fitness 19 gym next door if you desire a full gym. The hotel grounds are very nice, kind of Spanish style with lots of areas to sit and relax. Kind of off the beaten path with lots of parking. Highly recommended... Enjoy!
Manager Response: Thank you David for sharing your recent experience on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our facilities. We hope you will visit us back soon!

Summary: I frequently stay at Hampton Inns.  I really enjoyed this trip.  This was the second time I've stayed here and both trips have been great. The staff is very responsive to any requests and go out of their way to assist. Highly recommend this hotel for a visit to the San Clemente area.
Manager Response: Hello Jody, Wonderful to hear you enjoyed your recent visit at the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente. Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. I will share your review with my team.

Summary: Amanda Thomas made my visit at the Holiday Inn Express so pleasant.  I arrived very late in the evening and she went out of her way to help me.  She is a wonderful part of the Holiday Inn Express team!  Thank you Amanda for providing excellent customer service!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay. We will share your comments with the staff, especially Amanda. We hope you will visit us back soon!

Summary: Walked in last minute and got a room with a great rate. Hotel staff was very nice and accommodating. Room was spacious and clean. Bed was a bit hard for my personal liking but still good. The only reason for the 3 star rating is air conditioning unit. I notice while sleeping I would wake up hot and the a/c would be off. Once I  starting moving around it would kick on. I stayed in  a Holiday Inn Express in Hermosa Beach 2 weeks ago and noticed the same thing at that hotel. I just thought it was random. Looking around the Hermosa Beach hotel I noticed what looked like a notion detector and would make sense of why when your sleeping the a/c doesnt kick on. I have stayed in many hotels that have this similar items. It is annoying to wake up hot and have to move around to kick in the
Manager Response: Hello Pat, Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. I am glad to hear you enjoyed your recent visit. I do apologize for the AC incident. I can understand your frustration. I do need to mention that our AC units have a wall control panel and you can set the room temperate to your comfort. Once the unit reaches the desire temperature the unit shuts off. With that said, I will have my team check the AC unit just in case. We value our guests comments and suggestions and thank you once more for your review. We hope you will visit us back soon!

Summary Heading: A pretty good Holiday Inn Express
Summary: I stayed here for an overnight business trip. The hotel is clean and the pool looked very nice. The staff is very friendly. The rooms are typical for Holiday Inn Express. The beds are very comfortable and they have all the usual amenities.  A few minor concerns brought my rating from a 4 to a 3. There doesn't seem to be much sound dampening material used in the building. I could hear every footstep from the room above mine. The rooms are carpeted so it was really creaking floorboards, not feet hitting a hard surface. I could also hear some highway noise. It didn't disturb my sleep but if you are sensitive to noise it could be a problem.   The driveway entrance is a bit weird. I arrived late due to flight delays. The GPS directs down a small side street to a strip mall. You end
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay. Our hotel sits on a hilltop and has a nice view of the surrounding area and yes it is a bit tricky getting to our location as we share locations with the shopping center located below our property. I do need to mention that we are schedule to complete a full guestroom renovation and your comments regarding room noise is one item we will addressing. We hope you will return and visit us back soon.

Summary: Decent place for the money paid. We were in town for the PGF nationals and decided to stay in San Clemente because it was cheaper than staying in Irvine or Huntington Beach and the travel time  was still about the same compared to those closer hotel options (weird, but with traffic I guess it made sense). This hotel was decent, rooms were clean, breakfast was good, staff was friendly. The pool was broken the first day we arrived, which was a bummer, but it was working the next evening. Location is kind of weird as it is up a steep hill behind a strip mall. It is not too far from the San Clemente beach and pier. Overall, it was a good choice for the money we paid. Only issue, we extended our stay for an extra night in the middle of the week. We did this very late one evening
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay. I am sorry the staff did not explain our rates when you extended and will speak with the team regarding this incident. We do believe we are the best value in the San Clemente area. Not only are we 1 mile from the beach, all our guests enjoy our room amenities that include free breakfast, free WiFi, and free parking, There are plenty of restaurants to enjoy and shopping to do all within our location. We hope you will visit us back soon.

Summary: Room was extremely clean..bed and pillows were super comfortable..bathroom was very clean but small..shower pressure was perfect.  I was so happy to know they had a coin laundry facility..it was so convenient.  Fridge in our room was cold BUT had an annoyingly loud clicking sound..!!  It was nice to NOT hear the freeway traffic but I would DEF suggest to NOT be on the 1st floor as it’s loud in the morning..!!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We apologize for the noisy fridge.  Yes, please do contact us directly so we can place you on the top floor to avoid any disturbance. We are delighted your enjoyed your recent visit and hope you will visit us back soon!

Summary: Very comfortable bed and pillows. Very convenient - only a few blocks off the 5, but no noise. Great hot breakfast. What set this hotel apart was the front desk staff. Amanda and Guzy were as helpful, personable and friendly as I ever remember at a hotel. Housekeeping seems great, too, as rooms were very clean. Be cautious with parking. Spaces in front are way too close together. I got dings on both sides of my car. GRRR! There is a parking lot in back of the hotel which doesn't get much use. Much better parking option. The management should also consider adding safes in the room. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Zipdad, Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. I am sorry about the parking incident and will further investigate. Delighted to read you enjoyed your stay, we are finalizing dates for our guest room renovations and we are planning to look into in-room safes for our guests. We appreciate your comments and hope you will visit us back soon.

Summary: I would have given this place an excellent review, but I believe the front desk and housekeeping don’t communicate well as we had to ask for towels each night. On the good side, the breakfast is legit! Hot food and great service! Kudos to Jenny! Also Guzy was incredibly helpful and friendly to my whole family! It was quiet and fairly comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: As close as this is to the freeway we heard no highway noise. Unfortunately the floors/ceilings must be thin because we heard a lot of noise, especially loud walking, from whatever was above us. But the room was tidy. Bathroom is small. King size Bed was comfortable with 4 king size pillows. And comfortable clean sheets with white duvet cover.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was very nice, clean and comfortable.  The staff was very nice. Breakfast was another story.  The food looked good if you could get to it.  There was no order at all, everyone was just converging on the food area and not leaving anything for the other customers.  The breakfast room held only about 49 people max, but there were about 60 people in the room and at least 30 kids.  It was difficult to move around the food area and the room itself since it was so congested.  There were a lot of tables and chairs for a small room, so when people sat at the tables they were bumping into each other.  We finally got some breakfast food, but not much since the servings were raided before we could get to it.  We could not really enjoy breakfast in such a chaotic situation.  We watched
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on TripAdvisor. We appreciate your comments and apologize for the breakfast experience, we will try to reconfigure our table sitting as well as monitoring the flow on the breakfast room. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our spacious, comfortable clean rooms. I will share your review with my Team. We hope you will visit us back soon! Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary: Went for a wedding at the Casino San Clemente. Hotel is very modern with large rooms, covered pool and included breakfast; nice view from the top of the hill, a nearby plaza packed with stores is very good to have near you and there's a nice mall on top of the next hill 5 min away. Nice staff, the property was clean and very busy during the weekend, the price range was decent but that depends on what type of room you reserve.
Manager Response: Hello Richard, So exciting to hear you had a wonderful experience. Yes you are correct, our guestrooms are spacious and well appointment with various complimentary amenities. All our guests enjoy our covered pool, free WiFi, and complimentary breakfasts buffet. We also added to all our guestrooms Keypr Tablets for guest to browse through the internet and order food, explore local attractions, and shop online. We are the only hotel in the area that offers this amenity. Our hotel is located just one mile from one of the most popular beaches for surfing and a short 12 minute walk to the San Clemente Outlets and various restaurants. Perfect place to get away and enjoy an unique city that offers something for everyone. Hope you will visit us back soon Richard. Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary: I chose this hotel because it’s located near all the main freeways. It was very easy to get to highway and to local shops and restaurants in the downtown harbor area as well. The staff was incredibly friendly and efficient. Rooms were comfortable and clean. This is a no-frills place, and the price was good. I felt safe, and rooms were quiet even though freeway was right there.
Manager Response: Hello KonaGirl, Thank you for sharing your recent visit on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your hotel accommodations, will share your comment with the Team. Thank you once again.

Summary Heading: Awesome Hotel - There's a reason they're #1 on TripAdvisor
Summary: Beautiful hotel and great staff. I went there for a Wedding at Ole Hanson Beach Club and the venue is just a short trip around the corner. Quick and easy check in process, beautiful swimming pool, and top notch bathrooms in the room. Hotel is up on a hill which makes for some great room views. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: We are delighted to read you had a wonderful experience. Thank you for posting your review. Our hotel team is dedicated to deliver the best possible experience for all our guests. We hope you will visit us back soon :)  Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary: Best hotel in San Clemente! Very quiet and great service. Staff very friendly and always willing to help you out. I have stayed here quite a few times now and the rooms are always clean, no issues with sound and a nice quite location right off the freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. My staff takes great pride in maintaining the quality and cleanliness of our guestrooms and property. We are committed to deliver the best possible experience for all our guests. We hope you will visit us back soon! Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary: Booked this hotel for a short family trip to Orange County. It was a good central location for our needs - we were both north and south on the coast from the location and it was always easy to get to from either freeway or surface streets.   It was clean and quiet, the common areas were updated. The room was comfortable - the mattresses could have stood to be updated - but everything else was totally fine. Bathroom was recently updated and quite clean.   Staff was SUPER friendly and helpful. Loved interacting with each one we met.   Only challenge was the location is a tad hard to find in the dark. You have to go through a strip mall parking lot - look for the signs and go up the hill.   Would book again if in the area.
Manager Response: Delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent visit. Thank you for recognized our staff and the cleanliness of our spacious guestrooms and public areas. My team is committed to deliver the best possible experience for all our guests. Once again, thank you for sharing your recent stay and posting your review on Tripadvisor. Safe Travels, Ernie M.-General Manager

Summary: We were greeted warmly at the front desk by Sarah. She got us checked in quickly and put us on the floor we requested. She was awesome.  Room was clean and well stocked. The air conditioner was a bit loud and hard to get to the right temperature.   Breakfast was great. The kitchen staff was very friendly and helpful. They even filled my hubby’s coffee on the way to refill the big coffee thermos.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your most recent visit at the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente. We are delighted to hear Sarah provided outstanding guest service. We do take great pride in providing a clean and fresh room for our guest to enjoy. Yes, we provide complimentary breakfast everyday as well as coffee service 24 hours. We hope you will return and visit us back soon !

Summary: This hotel provided us with a nice stay while we were visiting my mom for a few days. The property itself was very clean and welcoming. The hotel lobby and hallway smelled so good! Staff was very friendly and helpful. They have an outside fireplace in front of the lobby with tables and chairs which provided a nice place to hang out and play cards.  Our room was a good size and had everything we needed for a very comfortable stay - everything was clean and tidy, AC worked, beds were clean and comfy, plenty of pillows, TV pivoted (great for my son!), plenty of towels in the bathroom.   My only complain would be the obscene about of noise the guest on the floor above me made almost all night long! My son fell asleep early (and he sleeps like a log), so I didn't call the front desk
Manager Response: Hello Monica, Delighted to hear you enjoyed our recent addition of the outdoor fireplace. Yes, you are correct, our guestrooms are comfortable and well equipped. Our staff makes a sincere effort to accommodate our guests needs, we thank you for sharing your recent visit and value your  feedback. We will address the noise incident when we finish our room renovation this upcoming year. We hope you will visit us back soon!

Summary: The San Clemente-North Holiday Inn Express is a great value. Clean rooms, quiet, friendly staff.  Close to the San Clemente Outlets, and restaurants.  Pleasantly surprised compared to other Holiday Inn Express' in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you Michael for posting your recent visit. We are very just a few blocks away to the San Clemente Outlets and various restaurants and boutique shops plus we are just 1 mile from the beach :)

Summary: During my visit, it was great to have a clean room, nice staff. They are very kind and in any question they help you right away.  I  want to thank especially to Sarah who welcomed us to the hotel and gives us lots of information about the city and the hotel. She answered all of our questions and helped us very much. It was very helpful. We were very lucky to have this kind of care.  Thanks to all of others who are really kind.
Manager Response: Delighted to read you enjoyed your recent visit. Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. Will share your comments to the team, especially Sarah :)  We hope to see you back soon. Ernie M. General Manager

Summary Heading: It Hurt to Pay $179 a Night for a 2 Star Hotel
Summary: It really hurt to pay $179 a night for this mediocre 2-star hotel. There are much nicer hotels for much better value elsewhere in Southern Orange County, so unless you absolutely have to be in San Clemente, I would advise staying away from this overpriced mediocre property. The Holiday Inn a bit north in Lake Forest (which is a "real" Holiday Inn, not an Express) is much nicer and similarly or lower priced.  The room was okay - not horrible, not great. My room looked out on a tall wall, sort of like you sometimes find in New York City where your room looks out on an airshaft. The blackout curtains worked fine. Unfortunately, the room was near the ice machine, which was loud.  The buffet breakfast (included with the room) was the most disgusting breakfast I have ever had in a
Manager Response: We are grateful for your honest feedback and will explore expanding our breakfast selections soon. We believe our room rates are competitive and provide value considering the beach location in the city of San Clemente. All our guest get to enjoy the complimentary breakfast, we also do not charge for parking and provide free WiFi. We encourage to plan ahead so you are able to get the best possible rate when you plan to revisit San Clemente. We have attempted to get in contact with you to further discuss your experience and hope we can hear from you soon. Safe Travels, Ernie Montalvo-General Manager ernie@hiesanclemente.com

Summary: Sarah at the front desk was extremely courteous, pleasant and helpful. We were always greeted with a smile and she is the reason we stay here on a regular basis. Quality customer service is hard to come by these days but it makes all the difference.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. Delighted to read you enjoyed your recent visit. Will share your comments to the staff especially Sarah.  Ernie M. General Manager

Summary Heading: Guest Services Associate Sarah is amazing!
Summary: My family stayed at this clean, comfortable and nicely decorated hotel for a lengthy stay. The best accommodations for our needs were the 1 bedroom suites which unfortunately are limited. Ideally we would have preferred to stay in just 1 suite our entire stay. This was not possible because other people had reserved the suite for certain days throughout our stay. But, to our great fortune wonderful Sarah came to our rescue and worked diligently , watching sometimes hourly the reservations on the computer and most often was able to either allow us to stay in our suite or move us to another one on the same floor which made life so much easier for us. Not only is Sarah a super front desk miracle worker at reservations, she always greeted us with a smile and kind words. She is a
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your recent visit on Tripadvisor. So wonderful to read you and your family had a pleasant stay. I will share your comments with the team, especially Sarah! Sincerely, Ernie M. General Manager

Summary: Nice clean new facility. One small annoyance which Sarah immediately took care of. She could not have been more responsive. Well worth following through to find this slightly off the path hotel. One time there and you know the way.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. I am delighted to hear Sarah took care of your needs. I will share your review with the staff and Sarah.  Safe Travels, Ernie M.

Summary Heading: Will stay here over and over again!
Summary: I have always been a fan of Holiday Inn when looking for a decent, reasonably priced hotel and have stayed in many. This, by far, has been the absolute best one I've ever stayed in! To say it was beautiful is an understatement! If it wasn't for seeing their logo on everything, you'd think you were in a upscale hotel! Beautiful atmosphere, super clean, big rooms, comfy beds and free breakfast! (also need to mention the warm, white chocolate macadamia cookies that they bake in the afternoon!) Every staff member was AMAZING!! Each were so kind and more than accommodating. We stayed 4 nights and they treated us like we've know each other forever! Every hotel needs to take a hospitality class from this staff! Bravo Holiday Inn San Clemente!! Looking forward to our next stay
Manager Response: We are ecstatic that you enjoyed your recent visit. Thank you for recognizing the efforts of the staff and upkeep of the property. We hope you will visit us back soon!  Ernie M.

Summary: Just off  freeway 5 is this pleasant hotel.At night It is little bit tricky to find at the end of the shopping center. The service is good , the parking by the door and the rooms big and well noise insulated so that traffic is no problem. Breakfast was good and the wifi works well.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent visit and posting your review on Tripadvisor. Delighted to hear you enjoyed your short visit. Will share your comments with the team.  Ernie M.

Summary: The lights weren't working, but as soon as I reported the fault, the staff instantly repaired it within minutes. The bed was comfortable, the room spotless after cleaning, and the walls were thick. All the amenities were working perfectly. Breakfast was delicious the staff was friendly especially Sarah who worked at the front desk. I enjoyed my stay immensely.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your recent visit on Tripadvisor. Delighted to hear you had a great experience. I will share your comments with my Team and Sarah.  Safe Travels, Ernie M.

Summary: This place was AMAZING and very accommodating.  Location was perfect just a few miles from Camp Pendleton.  Hotel was extremely clean and service was great!! Front desk personnel were very polite, especially Sarah she accommodated our needs fast and without hesitation.
Manager Response: Thank you Rachel for sharing your recent visit. Will share your review with the team especially Sarah.  Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary: I love staying at THE Holiday Inn Express!! There is absolutely nothing that i can't say anything bad about this hotel, but i absolutely love it here and I'm going to keep on coming here bcuz everyone is friendly and so nice to talk to them. So to the employees and to the manager's thank you for having me here. Sarah, Amanda & etc. that also work at the front desk thank you!!
Manager Response: Thank you Moe for your review. Delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent visit. I will ensure Amanda and Sarah are recognized for their efforts:)  Ernie M.

Summary: A good place to stop before heading through to LAX. Right next to the San Diego freeway but rooms were quiet. Front desk staff were excellent on check-in. Thank you, James, for helping with the room cards failing just before our late checkout. Parking was complimentary. Walking was a bit difficult - that hill was very steep. We walked one mile down to the beach, and then one mile more along to the Pier for dinner. I was a bit disappointed there was no room safe, otherwise, the rooms were very good. The breakfast was good; same as the other express we stayed at on this trip.
Manager Response: Thank you Karen for sharing your recent visit on Tripadvisor. We will be installing In-room safes this year as part of our renovation. I will share your comments with the staff and James.

Summary: If there was more room for friends to hang out, I would have rated this hotel 5 stars. But maybe it’s for you to just stay and hangout elsewhere, it’s not a resort.  Friendly, helpful, informative and alert staff at the front desk. Rooms are nice. Breakfast is okay, but the restaurant is tiny.
Manager Response: Hello Marian, Thank you for sharing your most recent visit. We value all our guest comments and will look into on how to reconfigure our furniture throughout the public areas. Will share your review with the team. Ernie M. General Manager

Summary Heading: Service was excellent! Stayed for 2 days.
Summary: Great location, breakfast was yummy, hotel was very clean, top notch service!  We arrived super late from traveling. The hotel representative Kawika offered us a late check out since we arrived around 4 am. Was so nice because we needed the rest. He was so friendly and was much appreciated. Would definitely recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you Priscilla for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted you enjoyed your most recent stay. Will share your comments with the team. Ernie M. General Manager

Summary: Needed a pet friendly hotel.   This one is a gem.   Very accommodating and the pet friendly rooms are nice.    The staff is wonderful and very knowledgeable.   Highly recommend this place. Staff can give alot of suggestions for restaurants and shopping.
Manager Response: We are thankful you took the time to share your recent stay. We will share your comments with the staff and hope you will visit us back soon. Best wishes to you and your love ones for 2018!

Summary Heading: Great location, Great Service, Sarah at the front desk was very helpful
Summary: Stayed here for about a week and had zero issues.  location is a bit off the main road, but has all you need within a 5 min drive.  Hill up to the hotel is excellent for daily exercise.  Staff was fantastic.  Sarah at the front desk was a great help when checking out of the hotel.  I had an issue on my bill and she took care of it right away.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent visit. We value our guests comments and take pride on delivering the best guest experience. I will share your review with the team and Sarah.  Ernie M- General Manager

Summary: I was in San Clemente for 5 days. This hotel is excellent. Nice size rooms, clean and the service from everyone here was professional, friendly and courteous.  I will definitely stay here again. From reception to housekeeping to personnel in breakfast....Excellent and Professional at all times!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent visit. Will share your comments with the team! Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary: Tiffany and Brenna were incredibly helpful and accommodating. They ensured that we had everything we needed. The reason I couldn't give a full five stars is because RAMON was the least helpful, most obnoxious worker I have ever encountered. All he did was consistently blame the guests for problems and interrupt our event. The fact that he is working in the hospitality industry is the most baffling mystery in recent history.   Other than that I am very grateful to have gotten the chance to work with this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Ryan, Thank  you for sharing your recent experience at the Holiday Inn Express. I will share your comments with Tiffany and Brenna. I also will speak with Ramon and address your concerns. I apologize for the inconvenience. Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary: I stayed here for a short conference so I wasn’t able to choose my own hotel. I was very impressed. It’s up on a lush knoll and has nicer than expected amenities. The staff was friendly. The pool and outdoor patio area was pleasant. Breakfast was varied and plentiful. The Kurig in the room was appreciated. I wouldn’t want to be here without a car. The driveway down to the strip mall—the only close option—was super steep and the dining options limited. There’s no way to get booze onsite or anywhere nearby if that matters to you. Parking is plentiful and very close. It was one mile to cute shops and the lovely pier and beach.
Manager Response: Hello Beth, Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay. We apologize our location was not convenient. Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary Heading: My go-to hotel in San Clemente
Summary: I stayed in this hotel in early October. It was probably my fourth time staying there, because I find it dependably clean and attractive, and conveniently located. Sarah at the front desk was very attentive, as all the staff have been. On booking one of my previous stays, when I told a staff member that I was a light sleeper, she actually went to the floor where she was going to reserve me a room to find the quietest one. I also liked the new iPad/tablet.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent visit. Thank you for recognizing my staffs efforts and posting your review on Tripadvisor. I will share your comments with the staff especially Sarah.  Safe Travels, Ernie M. General Manager

Summary Heading: Love San Clemente but the hotel is in a weird location
Summary: Booked this on points and it is a great value for that.  The hotel is tucked away behind a shopping center so it is a little weird to get to.  Other than that, the hotel is great and a nice place to stop off on the way from or to LA or San Diego.  Will stay here in the future again.
Manager Response: Hi Jason, Delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent visit. Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor and sharing your experience. Ernie M-General Manager

Summary: I normally do not give reviews but this is an exception because of the excellent service given to us especially of Ms Sarah at Reception Desk and Mr. Patrick of Reservation. All our requests were granted - beach towels, beach umbrellas. We arrived early but were given our room.  I was even helped with my membership to the hotel club. We had  great holiday staying in the hotel. We will not hesitate recommending to stay there with our friends.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel and staff.....bring your own alarm clock
Summary: First, the bad. I HATE the tablet thing they have replaced the traditional alarm clock with. As others have expressed issue with the cameras on this, that's not my biggest complaint since any good lawyer would have a field day if it was ever discovered these were used by hotel staff. My complaint is that the alarm clock feature on the tablet only works if the system is up. On two occasions I set the alarm and it rebooted during the night to correct the guest name to my name the first stay and on the second stay it corrected the name to someone else and again erased the alarm clock setting. The front desk suggested a wake up call......a phone is the last thing this business traveler wants to wake up to and there is no snooze button on the phone. Workaround, although not optimal,
Manager Response: Hello Bill, Thank you for posting your review on TripAdvisor. I apologize for the alarm clock issue. Will look into this further. Regarding the tablet, the cameras are not active. We have documentation from KEYPR supporting my statement. Yet, I do understand your concern. I do have some exciting news to share with you. We are scheduled for a complete room renovation. We will be upgraded all our guest rooms and will have plenty of USB ports for our guests to use. Thank you once again for sharing your experience.  Safe Travels, Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary: This review is for the pico plaza location.  What a great hotel!  Clean, pool is in a charming courtyard, breakfast was really good, comfy beds Kawika and Tesh at the front desk were super accommodating going out of their way.  I sprained my ankle on our way there and Tesh insisted on getting ice so I didnt have to walk. The building is mediterranean style with a tile roof.  Entry is thru a cute landscaped area with tables and umbrellas.  What a find!!
Manager Response: Hello Debbie, Delighted to read you enjoyed your recent visit. Thank you for sharing your experience on Tripadvisor. Will share your comments with the team, especially Tesh and Kawika. Ernie M. General Manager

Summary Heading: Hard to find but a great price with amazing staff
Summary: Stayed here going to Pageant of the Masters in Laguna Beach.  Gave us a chance to explore San Clemente pier, go to 1000 steps beach, kayak at Dana Point.  Has a strange entrance since you have to drive through a mini-mall and up a steep drive.  But quiet and peaceful once you arrive.  Staff (especially Tesh) couldn't have been nicer or more accommodating.  Great full breakfast included.  Pool area is small and in full view of front desk and lobby.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family comes here on a regular basis, and we are always pleased. Awesome complimentary breakfast, fun pool, cool location and clean services. Everyone is happy to serve you and willing to bend over for you. Quiet and fun.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We are so pleased you enjoyed your visit and we appreciate you returning to our hotel time and time again. Will share your comments with the Team! Ernie M. General Manager

Summary Heading: Fabulous Place to Stay with a Pet
Summary: This hotel is nicely located and very accommodating to travelers with pets.  The front desk staff were very receptive and helpful.   The rooms are oversized and very comfortable.  Considering our stay was in mid July, the price point was appropriate for a beach community.  Our only complaint is there was not a green belt or designated area to walk our dog.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. Delighted to read you enjoyed your recent stay. We will look into your comment regarding a walk area for pets. Our hotel is nestled on a hill overlooking San Clemente, yet we do have ample parking where guests can walk their pet companions. We will explore other options. Safe Travels, Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary: We were greeted at the front desk by Christian who was so personable and helpful while checking us in, and through the rest of our stay. The hotel is lovely and maintained nicely. Breakfast was very good, many choices, with a pleasant and accommodating staff lady always ready to assist. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Sharon, Thank you for sharing your recent stay at the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente. Delighted to read you enjoyed your stay. Will share your comments to the staff. Safe Travels, Ernie M General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice Hotel in Spanish style
Summary: First booked the Holiday Inn Express because it is built in the same Spanish Mission style as downtown San Clemente, very romantic! The staff was very helpful, made it sure to give us a city map as getting around the town can be a bit challenging. But San Clemente is truly a beautiful beach town! And our stay at the Holiday Inn Express with its complimentary hot breakfast, spacious rooms and friendly staff made the stay perfect.
Manager Response: Dear Karin, Wonderful to read you enjoyed your recent stay. Yes, you are correct, San Clemente is a beautiful beach town. There is so much to enjoy, not only the various restaurants and boutique shops, but the scenic beach is by far the best to experience when visiting San Clemente. Thank you for sharing your experience on Tripadvisor.

Summary: Some holiday inns are nicer than others. This is one of the nice ones. Good breakfast, well maintained rooms and spaces, nice pool for the kids, lobby area is really pleasant, great service. Definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Merrie, Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. Delighted to read you enjoyed your stay at the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente. We hope you will return and visit us back soon!  Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary: As a military spouse I have stayed in hotel Rooms all over the world , this hotel is by far one of the best I have ever stayed in. From the extremely cleanliness of our room to the super friendly staff it was a perfect stay.  I cannot say enough good things about this hotel . I had not been to CA in 22 years and this was an amazing way to come back. The managers were exceptional and the cleaning staff were second to none . The breakfast buffet was perfect as well. It was well organized and there was plenty to choose from . Thank you so much for an absolutely wonderful stay. We will be back!!
Manager Response: Hi Jen, Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. Can't tell you enough how happy we are that you decided to stay with us. Your visit was just right as the current weather in San Clemente is perfect. I will share your comments with the staff and hope you will visit us back soon! Safe Travels, Ernie M-General Manager

Summary: This location is close to the freeway and not far from the beach. It is a different exterior look than typical at an HIX with a Spanish or mission type style. Really great outdoor pool. Very warm. No spa. Nice interior.
Manager Response: Hi Shannon, Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. Yes, we are a unique IHG property and we are delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent stay. Will share your comments with the team! Ernie M-General Manager

Summary: I really enjoy staying here. Cristian is very welcoming and accommodating. This is a very nice hotel in a hidden location. I love staying here! I highly recommend staying here and very close to outlets.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. Yes, we are close the Outlets, various local restaurants, and just a mile away from the beach. Will share your comments with the team and Christian. Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary: Presented as a 2 1/2 star hotel but feels more like a 3 star. Christian checked us in and was a standout with his great attitude. We will be back!  A little hard to find up in a hill through a shopping center but is is worth it.
Manager Response: Hi Terry, We appreciate your review on Tripadvisor. I will share your comments with Christian and the team. Please do come back and visit us back soon!  Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary: What a great place to stay!  We were assisted at the front desk by Christian Duarte and Guazy and Danika.  Who were so helpful in assigning us to a room close to our family members and knowing how tired we were from travel over 400 miles.  They were exceptionally courteous and really wanted to make our stay one that we would remember for years ...and they were successful!  They are a definite assets to Holiday Inn and we will be sure to stay here again in the near future 👍  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for acknowledging the service provided  by the staff at the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente. I am delighted to read you enjoyed your stay. I will personally thank Guzy, Christian, and Danica for delivered a memorable experience. Sincerely, Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary: Just spent a couple days here with my teenage grandson. This is one of our favorite hotels in the San Clemente area. We love the old mission style building. Rooms are roomy & clean, equipped with a fridge & microwave which is especially convenient when feeding a teenager. The free breakfast is nice & has a good selection. All staff are very nice & helpful. Christian, at the front desk, was very friendly & acknowledged us every time we walked through the lobby & always greeted us with a smile. He is a very good representative of this HIE & we look forward to seeing him the next time we visit.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean and spacious rooms with great beds, obviously well managed and maintained. Even has a pool that I didn't get a chance to try out. Breakfast was nothing special but quite adequate. All in all a great deal considering the very affordable rate.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent visit. We hope the next time you stay with  us you will be able to enjoy the pool. Will share your comments to the team. Safe Travels, Ernie M.-General Manager

Summary: Late arrival, and with the odd layout of the hotel it was a bit confusing.  The hotel is somewhat dated, but had everything we needed including laundry and hot breakfast.  Mark was especially helpful and courteous!  Would stay again if ever in the area
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent visit at the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente. Guests enjoy all our complimentary amenities including our hot breakfast buffet, free Wi-Fi, free parking, and the outdoor heated pool.  Safe Travels, Ernie M. General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed for a weekend getaway and I've never met a more friendly staff! Brenna was there all weekend to cater to our every need and was super friendly, always welcoming us with a smile and talking to us like we're family. We will definitely be coming back.
Manager Response: Dear Morgan, Thank you for sharing your recent visit. Delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay. I will share your comments with the staff and Brenna! Hope you will return and visit us back soon. Ernie M. General Manager

Summary: Positives - Very close to the North end of Camp Pendleton, the Onofre entrance. We were visiting family on base and it made it convenient, it is about 10 or so minutes. The hotel looks like it has been remodeled and looking new. The rooms were comfortable and spacious with amenities like Kuerig coffee. The breakfast had many choices and some of those changed everyday. They have a pancake making machine that makes two fresh pancakes at the push of a button.  Negatives - The breakfast area is ball with only about 15-18 tables. I would imagine if the hotel was full the breakfast area would fill up quick.                                            Big Negative and why I gave 3 Stars, noise above. The first night my wife and I had to listen to someone above walk back and forth. I
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to read you enjoyed the room accommodations and our pancake machine. Please accept my sincere apology for the noise level and breakfast sitting set up. We are renovating our public space and will reassess the sitting arrangement in the breakfast area. We do take our guests comments serious and we thank you again for sharing your recent stay.  Sincerely, Ernie M-General Manager

Summary: Was looking for a property for a small business meeting (15 people) in South OC and didn't want to break the bank at one of the other coastal resorts. Based on a recommendation, I checked out this property. What a find ! Definitely more upscale than the average Holiday Inn. Great meeting facilities, excellent catering from Sundried Tomato, quality rooms, excellant event staff (Tiffany was awesome) and a great location close to the beach. All for a great price. Highly recommend !
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you had a great experience. Will share your review with the team and Tiffany. Safe Travels, Ernie M-General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at other Holiday Inn Express properties, but this was by far the best.  I've been out of town 3 weekends in the last month and this property was every bit as nice as the hotel I stayed in in San Francisco but MUCH less expensive.  My biggest issue was that the toilet paper holder was weird and the roll kept coming off, and the free shampoo dried my hair out.  But the hotel was clean and quiet, staff was uniformly pleasant, helpful and courteous, and I would definitely stay here again.  Very comfortable bed, nice sheets and towels, plenty of room for my clothes, great free wifi, lots of choices for breakfast (chobani yogurt in two flavors!)....maybe not a gourmet breakfast, but better than average....and some options changed day to day..... If they had a safe in the
Manager Response: Hello SJ, Thank you for sharing your recent stay on Tripadvisor. Delighted to read you enjoyed your stay. We will review our bathroom amenities and the paper holder location. We value all our guests comments and will share with the team. We hope you will return to visit us back soon. Safe Travels, Ernie-General Manager

Summary: It was an awesome stay from the booking to the service at the Hotel.  The people were very friendly and helpful.  The Hotel was only 1 1/2 miles away from the San Clemente pier. There are also a few places to eat right at the bottom of the property and a big outlet mall across the street.  They have a heated pool so you can swim all year long.   This Hotel also had an in room tablet with Pandora.  My new Husband and I were able to slow dance to music in our room.    Would definitely recommend
Manager Response: Hello Charmion, Thank you for sharing your recent visit on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to read you spent your Honeymoon with us. We are also glad you used the In-room Tablet. We are the only hotels in the area that offers this complimentary amenity.  On behalf of the staff we wish you and your beloved many wonderful moments of love, health, and progress. Warm Regards, Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary: Spent one night here on a quick weekend to visit friends.  The property and room quality is consistent with other similar HIE properties.  The entry way and pool area were especially nice.  The bed was comfortable and the bath was clean and well stocked.  However, the refrigerator in our room was ridiculously noisy every time it cycled off, and our room faced out to Interstate 5.  So, there was a fair bit of traffic noise.
Manager Response: Thank you Karen for sharing your recent stay on Tripadvisor. Delighted to read you enjoyed your stay. I will share your review with the team. We hope you will visit us back soon! Safe Travels, Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at other Holiday Inns before but none of them compared to this one.  The breakfast was great and way more then I expected.  Not to mention the staff was amazing and so helpful.  The rooms were very clean...I would definitely recommend staying here!
Manager Response: Hi Emily, Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again.   Safe Travels, Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary Heading: This is a really good hotel with one major exception.
Summary: I have stayed at the Holiday Inn San Clemente a number of times and have found it to always be a pleasure. The location is wonderful being situated just off i5 and not far from PCH. The rooms are very clean and updated. The Hotel staff is top notch and always willing to go the extra mile. Under other circumstances, I would rate this hotel a 4 out of 5. The very big issue here is that the hotel now has cameras installed in every room. No, this is not some tin-foil hat ranting about the perceived presence of spy cameras. Each room is now equipped with a Keypr System Android tablet as the alarm clock/hotel services guide. While this seems pretty cool at first glance and no doubt adds a lot of conveniences, the tablet has front and rear facing cameras and a microphone. This provides
Manager Response: Dear Sargewilco, Thank you for sharing your experience on Tripadvisor. Delighted to read you enjoyed your stay. Regarding the Keypr tablets,  I do understand your concern regarding privacy. We selected this particular vendor in light they support a vast number of hotels that use their products and services. Our intent was to enhance and facilitate the room experience at no additional cost. I can assure you the camera is not active. The microphone is active on the tablet, this allows the guest to voice command the tablet to perform a Google search, like Siri on a apple phone.  I am also going one step further and have requested a statement from Keypr to support my claim.  I hope you will continue to stay with us. We can remove the tablet in the future if you are not comfortable. Kind Regards, Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary: Arrived early but we're able to check in.  We were given a suite, which was large and spacious.  Room faced on to the freeway, which meant you could hear a lot of traffic news.  The room and bathroom were quite dingy and looked like they could do with a refresh, they were really dimly lit too, which added to the 'dark' feel of the suite.  Breakfast was just about acceptable....the worst we'd had on our 2 week trip.  No cut up fruit and limited choice.  Didn't use the pool, however its right by the reception area, very small and the whole pool is shaded throughout the day.  Plenty of parking and a good location for San Clemente beach and restaurant area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Express and for taking the time to provide feedback about your experience at Holiday Inn Express San Clemente North.  I would like to start by apologizing to you for not meeting your expectations. We strive to make each stay as pleasant and comfortable as possible, and we will use your comments to coach our team in order to provide a better experience in the future.  I hope you will give us a chance by staying with us again to show you that your unsatisfactory stay was an exception.  Again, thank you for sharing your comments, and if I can be of assistance to you, please contact me directly at 9494988800 or info@hiesanclemente.com. Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary: Nice hotel, not easy to find, just off freeway  Clean rooms, plenty of parking  Nice breakfast buffet, good staff,very friendly  Near city center, shopping., golf courses, etc  On the. Way to San Diego, great place to stop, San Clemente nice town to visit on the ocean
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent stay. We value all our guests comments. Delighted to read you enjoyed your stay. Ernie M.

Summary: Very satisfied with the price, good service, great breakfast too. Location is lil tricky behind an old mall kinda place and next to Interstate 5. We couldn't hear any noise. Front desk service was charming. Lots of parking.
Manager Response: Delighted to read you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for sharing your experience. We hope you will visit us back soon.  Safe Travels, Ernie M. General Manager

Summary: Our family stayed at this hotel for two days. Great rates on Priceline. We loved it. The Beach is close.  Rooms are big and clean. Everything is new. Staff is the best around.  Very quiet rooms.  Nice pool.

Summary: With HIE properties you can usually count on their consistent product and this is no exception.  The hotel was very clean and well maintained.  The building has an old California mission look and feel to it on the outside and the lobby feels very large for an HIE.  The beds were comfortable along with great shower pressure and plenty of hot water. Front desk staff and all service was excellent... I forgot my toothbrush and was quickly given a free replacement.    I thought the breakfast was good standard HIE food and the eggs were even better than expected.  Sometimes they can be a little runny or nasty but these were thick and fluffy scrambled eggs that I'd find at a nice breakfast restaurant.... props to the chef!  I value the breakfast included because I'm a coach and had 7

Summary: We live in Southern California and decided to explore San Clemente for a day.  Hotel has a quaint California mission design and the staff was very friendly.  The location is not convenient for walking trips to the beach, but the parking was ample and considering the Sunday night rate, we simply used the car a bit more.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience on Tripadvisor. On behalf of the team we are delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent stay. We hope you will return and visit us back soon! Regards, Ernie M. General Manager

Summary Heading: Very good place to stay in San Clemente
Summary: The place is very clean. Very comfortable. We like the freeway nearby our sliding door opened up to it and it was fun to see the cars go by while in our room. The hot breakfast and coffee and juice adds very good value to what we paid to stay here. The place is nice. I would recommend highly.
Manager Response: Hello Alan, Thank you for posting your review on TripAdvisor. We are so happy you enjoyed your stay. We hope you will return and visit us back soon! Ernie Montalvo-GM

Summary: Very clean, quiet, friendly, and easy to find.  Breakfast was very good, rooms were spacious and comfortable and the outdoor pool was heated.  Thankful for the wifi because their phones were not working and I was having trouble with my cell phone also.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay at the Holiday Inn Express. I will share your comments with the team. We hope you will return and visit us back soon! Ernie M.-GM

Summary: We stayed at this hotel while visiting family. It is a nice hotel for a decent price. However, the location is not great. It is located behind shops with a very steep hill. The staff was excellent, nice, accommodating, and everyone we encountered had a smile.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review. I happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. I apologize our location was not convenient. If your travels brings you back to San Clemente, we hope you will stay with us again. Ernie M.-General Manager

Summary: This hotel is a great value, you get a great, clean and well staffed hotel at an affordable price.  The staff is very friendly and accommodating, especially Guzy she treats you like she honestly cares.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and sharing your recent visit. I will share your comments to the staff and Guzy!  Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary: Excellent hotel. Kinda hidden behind a shopping mall like most have said but it was well worth it. I would definitely stay again if I am in the area. Bars are not walking distance but Uber only cost $5 to closest one's.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review on Tripadvisor. We value all our guests comments and will share your review with the team. Regards, Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary: My family and I came to san Clemente for a camping and surfing trip, and ended up adding a couple of hotel nights to extend our vacation. We LOVED this hotel! The building is clean and modern, the staff are really nice and the room was exactly what we needed to unwind after 5 nights of camping. We didn't use the pool or workout facilities, but they both seemed nice and clean. The complimentary breakfast was delicious and the prices were reasonable for our stay. The location is perfect; right by the highway (which you can't hear from inside) and close to the beach in san Clemente! I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone, whether on a short business stay, a beach getaway or a family vacation!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We are ecstatic you had a great experience on your most recent visit. We value your comments and will share with my team. We hope to see you again soon! Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel at a Reasonable Price
Summary: I stayed here for three nights while traveling for business. It's a nicely maintained hotel with clean (albeit small) rooms.   Pros: Full breakfast for free.  Convenient location near freeway, outlet mall, and restaurants.  Welcoming front desk staff.  Comfortable beds with choice of firm and soft pillows.  Nifty tablet provided in the room for accessing hotel services.   Could be better: TVs could be bigger and easier to navigate with a guide.  Mini fridge is loud - I had to unplug each night.  Wifi is pretty good but could be a little faster.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay. We also value your honest feedback and will consider your suggestions as the hotel will be renovating soon. Regards, Ernie Montalvo

Summary Heading: Great little place...basic, but everything works
Summary: Ok, so, I stayed here, not by choice but thru my work. Having said that, its not the most luxurious place on Earth but it's a very nice, basic but better-than-average place to rest your head. Everything works just fine, it's very clean, perhaps even excessively so, and the facilities again are basic but very functional. This place reminds me more of a good dishwasher - it's not the sexiest piece in your kitchen but it does the job day-in, day-out with no fuss. Here's the thing to remember...San Clemente, while a very cool beach community, doesn't really offer much in the way of accommodations. So, if you need a familiar face in an unfamiliar town, this is definitely the place you should check out first.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope you will return and visit us back soon! Ernie Montalvo

Summary Heading: GREAT VALUE AND CONVENIENT SOCAL LOCATION
Summary: A bit confusing to get to as it is behind a mini mall, but once you get to the top of the hill you can't help but be impressed by the unique exterior. Inside it was clean and bright. All staff were extremely friendly. Breakfast was great as well. Clean and comfortable room. Didn't use the outdoor pool but it is small. Location is great if you are exploring the coast. You are 10 minutes from San Clemente Pier, in 20 minutes you can be in Dana Point and Laguna Beach. Restaurants and gas/convenience stores close by.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We value all our guests feedback and are pleased to hear you enjoyed your recent stay. We hope you will visit us back soon! Regards, Ernie Montalvo-General Manager
