Summary: What a really nice place.. Super friendly staff. Clean rooms. Easily accessible (after you find it behind the shopping center the first time) Nice continental breakfast with plenty of options... what more could I ask for. We travel to this area about every two years... I found my permanent residence

Summary: We add a room with 2 beds. The two beds were in two separate rooms and share the same bathroom. It is was really great. It was like having 2 hotel rooms for the price of one. The continental breakfast was really normal, but at the time we were there they were doing renovation in the kitchen.

Summary: What can i say but five star flawless from check in to check out. Amazing customer service from every person in every department. I will only stay here during my beach trips. Felt as cozy as home. So impressed with the entire staff
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again.   Sincerely, Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary: Brenna is really great. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay. The service was amazing and in a very professional. The breakfast was delicious. I did however have some troubles at check in with Archer but after that everything was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We value your comments and will share with the staff, especially Brenna!  Regards, Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary: Spent 3 nights at this HIX recently with my wife and we totally enjoyed our stay. The room was clean and modern, the beds were very comfortable. Internet wireless access was fast. The location is right off the I-5 but we could not hear the traffic from our room (217). The only problem was a minor water leak from the bathroom ceiling. We called the front desk and was able to move to the room next door right away. Overall, a great value for the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay. We apologize for the water leak and will look into the incident. We hope you will visit us back soon. Ernie Montalvo General Manager

Summary: I stayed at this neat looking hotel after a day in San Diego on my way to LA. I booked it as a blind deal with priceline and couldn't have lucked into a better place to stay. The room was updated and large, with excellent AC.   The breakfast was excellent. Hot and cold options (cinnamon buns, pancakes, cereals, bagels, juices).  I arrived on a tuesday night and the group of young guys working the front desk were quick to offer taco recommendations at a nearby mexican restaurant. I settled on Pedro's Tacos, which was quite tasty. Their interest in my enjoyment of the night was a nice welcome to the hotel after a long day.   If make the drive down Highway 1 again I will be sure and check here for vacancies.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great room, very comfortable bed, quiet. Only issue was some difficulty finding it (you have to drive through a shopping center parking lot past the pizza place dumpsters to find the entry), plus the parking spaces at the hotel won't hardly accommodate more than a Mini Cooper size car.
Manager Response: Hello Judy, Thank you for posting a review on Tripadvisor.  I am glad you enjoyed our spacious rooms and hope you were able to take advantage of our complimentary breakfast. I am sorry you had a difficult time locating our hotel. I do agree it can be challenging finding our location. Regarding the parking situation, I will take this opportunity and remind the staff to explain to our guests where to park their vehicles as we have two levels for guests to park.  Warm regards, Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary Heading: Manager Eddy was a life saver
Summary: Eddy, the manager went above and beyond to save my family's vacation. The hotel was full that night due to a wedding. So, calling around we both realized the situation was worse than feared. There was not anything available within a 2 hour distance. He went above and beyond calling any contacts and even competitors. Needless to say, we ended up going where we needed to go, not only getting a room, but renting a house. Thank you so much for helping our family.
Manager Response: Dear Lonnie,  Thank you so much for posting your review. I am sorry we did not have a room for you, yet we did manage to find  a place for you and your family within our area in San Clemente. I trust you enjoyed your visit in San Diego. I hope you will visit us again when your travels bring you back to San Clemente.  Regards, Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the hotel to break up a trip down highway 1.  The hotel itself is situated within a complex of shops a restaurants which is handy if you want to pick up dinner etc.  The rooms were clean and comfortable and fine for an overnight stay! Breakfast was also good, with a selection of fruit cereals and hot items  Upon check in to the hotel they seemed to have a problem with our reservation and we were told that someone with a similar name had been checked in in our place.  This was quickly remedied and we were found a new room.   However a few days later we noticed that we had been recharged for our room.  Again after a bit of a phone call this was remedied but a bit of a hassle when you are travelling and on vacation
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. Please accept my apology for the billing discrepancy. I am glad my staff was able to correct the error. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of all our complimentary amenities we offer to all our guests.  Hope you will visit us back soon! Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary Heading: Overpriced for a Poor Night's Sleep
Summary: We have stayed at this property a number of times while visiting family.  The quality of the stay has gradually declined through the years.  This last stay was the last straw.  Despite paying nearly $200 for the hotel room, we were awakened by late-night/early morning returnees from a bar that insisted on stomping around their room for hours.  We had noisy people in the parking lot outside as well.  Given the price of the property, the security and civility need to improve significantly.   Finally, we declined the continental breakfast because the property had an offensive "news" channel on the television with the volume turned up.  I do not need to listen to extreme political opinions with my oatmeal after a sleepless night.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor, We are sadden to hear your recent stay was disappointing. Please accept our sincere apology for the noisy guests and the incident regarding the offensive news channel. I will share your comments with my team and address accordingly. I hope you will give us another opportunity to recover your business. Please feel free to call me so I can address any other concerns. My direct number is 949-498-8800, ext. 401.  Hope to hear from you soon. Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary: Such a beautiful hotel, with fantastic service. Worth every penny. The rooms are beautiful, the pool and fitness area are nice, and the staff is friendly. Has laundry options for guests and plenty of parking. Down the hill is a 99 cent store that is great if you have to live in your hotel room for awhile. 10/10 would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Jessie, Thank you for your compliments. We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel and the many complimentary amenities we offer to all our guests.  If your travels bring you back to San Clemente, we hope you will stay with us again.  Regards, Ernie M-General Manager

Summary: Needed a place to stay on short notice over Labor Day weekend. The rate was reasonable and rooms were available here. The business center was nice and worked well and the rooms were good. The checkin was smooth and Archie took good care of us.

Summary: Great choice for reasonable lodging in San Clemente.  Rooms spacious and well appointed.  Staff friendly.  Ample parking. Entrance awkward through strip mall parking lot.  Pool small. In spite of proximity to freeway, very quiet.  Temperature fan not controllable...either full on off. Healthy choices for breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay. We hope you will visit us back soon!  Regards, Ernie M.-General Manager

Summary: After having to leave the hotel we had been staying in because of a main water line breach we scrambled to find a hotel in San Clemente.  It didn't help that it was the first Saturday in August but we were fortunate to get a room here.  The hotel is somewhat secluded (sits on a hillside above a large strip mall) but easy access to the freeway and the main street that runs north-south through town.  It is an older property but very quaint and clean.  The front desk staff were very friendly and accommodating.  The rooms are larger than average, very clean, and the bed was comfortable. They serve a decent breakfast every morning with a lot of variety, including a pancake maker.  This is a great option for anyone looking for a quiet get-away or a quick stay passing through San
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review on Trip Advisor. We are pleased to hear you had a pleasant experience. Yes, our rooms are large and our cleaning staff takes great pride to ensure the rooms are spotless. Glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast, guest do love our pancake machines. Great location too!  It was one of the best decisions for the wedding we made!   We stay 3 nights (wedding Party too) and most guest stayed 1 or 2 nights because we made it a weekend thing and went to san Clemente peir for a beach day, the day before on Friday.  Great day!  We also had our rehearsal dinner in the banquet rooms at the Holiday inn express.  We catered from a local restaurant, really within walking distance, called Surfin chicken.  Another great idea.  This hotel gave me a great deal and was a perfect place for my 40 person rehearsal dinner, our first night at the hotel.  Tables were

The location was not easy to find.  Siri took me first to the Holiday Inn.  Arriving at about midnight, the staff were very friendly.  My room was adequate, not really anything special.  The bed was comfortable.  I was worried at first because I could hear voices in the next room.  But I wasn't disturbed during the night.  Breakfast was nice and there appeared to be quite a few families staying here as well.  It was definitely great to have a place to spend the night...however, I'm not sure what the regular room price is, but what I paid was rather high and I probably would not choose this hotel if
Manager Response: Hello Pat,  Sorry to hear your flight got cancelled. The area must have been very busy to have found a room available at our location. Summary: We had a good stay here. The room was very nice. The hubby did notice it looked like someone had put something into a decorative vase in the hall. He looked into it, and it seemed someone had spit food or threw something disgusting into it. He showed an employee who assured him someone would clean it up, but the next day it was still there, probably still is.

Manager Response: Hello Bettina,  Thank you for staying with us. It is true our property sits on a hillside off the highway exit 76. We offer spacious rooms and many amenities including complimentary breakfast, secure WiFi, and free parking.  We hope you will visit us back soon! Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary: I've stayed here prior, and reviewed this property. I am writing again because when you can come back to a hotel, and you continue to have an amazing value, experience, and the staff is on the ball, then I have to take the time to write.  Kudos to Carlos who is always a joy and professional in every way, Guzi who manages her team incredibly well as people are happy here. And newly meeting Danica and Brenna who are lovely and are a reflection of the overall quality of how this particular location treats their staff.  The cleaning personnel have incredible attitudes as well and the rooms are always in great shape. Thank you for your wonderful attitudes and work on the often weary traveler.  Barbara, New Hampshire
Manager Response: Dear Barbara, We can’t thank you enough for your kind words. Guzy, Brenna, Danica, and Carlos are excited you had another pleasant stay. So refreshing to read reviews like yours that acknowledges my staff’s efforts, as we consistently strive to deliver the best possible experience. Let us know when you will be in the area so we can personally arrange room accommodations.  Warn regards, Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary Heading: I booked the wrong Holiday Inn
Summary: I had meant to book the downtown San Clemente Holiday Inn, but booked the Holiday Inn Express very close to 405.  So instead of having a view of  the ocean, I had a view of a parking lot.  Having said that, it was not all bad.   Rooms were big. There was fridge in room, parking was easy, and it was quiet. It would have been nice to be near the shops and eateries in town, but for $50 less per night simply had to drive and park.  The pool was in a courtyard and shaded and the registration desk was manned by very young adults, possibly teenagers. I was able to check in early. The FREE Breakfast was PACKED, could not find a place to sit and could barely even get to food - go early.
Manager Response: I am sorry you did not stay at the hotel of choice, yet I am glad you enjoyed our large rooms with well appointed amenities. Indeed our breakfast room does get busy , especially in the summer months. My staff are young  but are professional and helpful to all our guests. Thank you for sharing you recent experience and hope you will return to visit us soon. Regards, Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary: Very convenient location for all your San Clemente/Southern Orange County activities. Attractive property that is clean and very well maintained. Friendly and helpful management and staff. Comfortable, nicely decorated rooms with very good beds. All the usual Holiday Inn Express amenities that you have come to expect. Tasty complimentary hot breakfast served every morning. Nice pool, and small business center on site. Lots of convenient off street parking. You can usually find a good rate at this location year round and even in the peak summer months, especially if you can plan and book early. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Hi Daryl,  Thank you for your review. I will share your comments with my team. Hope you will be visit us back soon!  Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary: Searched for hotels in the San Clemente or San Juan Capistrano area thru trip advisor. This Holiday inn came up. We decided to stay there. Great hotel. Very clean. The staff was friendly and helped us selecting a good seafood restaurant on the water. The only drawback it is hard to find. The GPS takes you to a residential area that is a stones throw away. But you can't see the hotel it's over an embankment. I called the hotel they are aware of this issue. They helped us navigate to the hotel. Don't let that get in the way of staying there. I will stay there again if I'm in the area.
Manager Response: Hello Bill,  Thank you for your review. I apologize for the GPS clitch, glad my staff was helpful. We hope you will return and vist us back soon!   Regards, Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary Heading: Oversized & quiet room at a very convenient location
Summary: We were given a larger than expected room with a king bed.  It was appointed well including an oversized stuffed chair with ottoman.  My concerns were that there was no mention at check-in that the small parking area in front of the hotel was not the only lot.  We had to find out (and use) about an adjacent side lot by accident.  Also, I'm not sure if this applies to all rooms, but the shower/tub had no shower mat or rubberized pads in the tub.  This is a major accident waiting to happen.  When I checked out, I mentioned the lack of a safety pad to the clerk, who merely shrugged and said, "Sorry".  (As it turns out I had to spread a hand towel on the floor of the tub to take my shower.  You may have to do likewise.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review. I apologize my staff did not act accordingly with regards to your concern. Safety is our top concern and will research further. Again, thank you for sharing your experience.  Regards, Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary: I had a work function and my colleges and I stayed at this hotel because it was near by the venue. The hotel staff was awesome, very accommodating. We needed an early check in which Brenna, the excellent front desk concierge, happily obliged. Throughout our stay she was polite, professional, and attentive. Its customer service like she provided that helps create life long patrons. Thank you Holiday Inn and thank you Brenna for making a necessary work event an enjoyable experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience. I will share your comments with Brenna and the rest of the team. We hope to see you back soon!  Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Summary: Okay, it's a Holiday Inn, but it didn't feel run of the mill, corporate or cookie cutter. The building is a beautiful older Spanish style building.  The rooms were clean and the staff was really helpful, friendly and went out of their way to talk with our children.  I'd recommend this hotel to anyone!  The only downside is it's a little tough to find - you have to drive through a shopping center parking lot to get there.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again.   Warm regards, Ernie Montalvo-General Manager

Gave us tips on places to eat around town and made sure we were comfortable during our stay.  I slept great on the very comfortable king bed in the room. Kudos to all the management and staff here for making me feel so welcome, accommodated and going above and beyond what is asked.  This will be my first choice in Orange County from this point forward.  Barbara New Hampshire

You drive around the back of the shipping parking lots (multiple) and will find a sign for the hotel to your right, then another sign.   It's up a steep hill, on top of the hill..
Manager Response: Dear Miata-MX5,  Thank you very much for your kind remarks. We appreciate your feedback and I will definitely be sharing it with our team. Our team takes great pride at serving our guests and strives for 100% guest satisfaction. I do hope you will come back to visit soon and we get a chance to say thank you in person! All the best to you in your travels and thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente!  Sincerest regards, Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary Heading: Great clean hotel, excellent team at the front desk as well as the manger
Summary: I travel around the world for business and I must say this hotel stay was one of the best I have ever had. I was not feeling well and they took great care of me, they made me food, and carried my luggage and most important they really cared. Being a woman traveling alone on business this type of experience could be difficult, but they made me feel comfortable and not alone. The room and the hotel is spotless and the team is excellent. Thank you for your great hospitality.
Manager Response: Dear phyllis f,  It was a pleasure to have you stay with us an thank you so much for your kind words. I know all too well about travelling and not feeling well and I am so glad to hear our team was able to help make your stay enjoyable. I remember meeting with you when you arrived and it was our pleasure to assist you in any way we could. Sometimes all you need when you are travelling is a caring staff and a comfortable room where you can get some rest. I do hope that your next visit with us you are feeling 100% so you can enjoy some of the great things to do here in beautiful San Clemente.  Thank you again for staying with us an I wish you all the best! Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary: Always have great service when I stay here, The staff is great!!! They all go the extra mile to make your stay very comfortable!!!You can see that the entire staff really cares about you and they are helpful and friendly.They have excellent customer service. The breakfast is great, and coffee too. We feel safe, comfortable, and always feel welcome, and know our room is clean every time we stay here.Office manager and desk staff are great!!!!They  are great helping with directions and google maps.
Manager Response: Dear lobofan98ys,  Thank you so very much for your kind review and your business. It is due to Guests like yourself that provide us feedback for praise and improvement that we are able to fine tune our efforts every day to ensure our Guest are 100% satisfied. We realize that whether on business or vacation the things, such as those you mentioned, like safety, a great breakfast and coffee and an attentive caring staff makes all the difference in creating that memorable experience which ultimately leads to guests that look forward to returning. I do hope during your next visit we get to meet as I would love to personally thank you. Until then safe travels! Sincerest regards,  Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary Heading: Pleasant stop on a road trip
Summary: On a California road trip down the Pacific Coast Highway.  Perfect for our overnight stay.  Hotel is set in  back of a small shopping center, but we managed to find it without any problems. Pleasant rooms and nice breakfast room.  What made it really special was Tesh, who checked us in.  He made a wonderful recommendation for dinner and was very anxious to make sure that we were happy and had everything we needed.
Manager Response: Dear Linda R,  Thank you so very much for the opportunity to welcome you to San Clemente during your recent visit. I always like hearing about how our team was able to make a personal connection and provide outstanding service so thank you for your wonderful comments and I will certainly share it with Tesh and the team. I do hope that should your travels bring you back to the area we will have the honor of welcoming you once again. On behalf of our team here at the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente our sincerest thanks and best wishes in all of your travels!  Kindest regards, Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary Heading: Best hotel stay I've had in two years!
Summary: My husband and I stayed the day here for a break on our road trip and we lived it! The staff was kind and cheerful, room service was delicious and one of the main managers was so nice to personally ask us about our stay. We will definitely stop by this location more often!
Manager Response: Dear aileen_hearts,  It's always a pleasure to receive such wonderful comments and I thank you for staying with us and sharing your wonderful feedback. We take great pride in providing each guest with great service and accommodations and I am so glad to hear we met your expectations!  Please let me know when you will be returning to the area as I certainly would love to welcome you back. Our Holiday Inn Express brand certainly is focused on making each guests visit most enjoyable and we hope that wherever your travels take you we will be your hotel of choice.  Thank you again and my very best wishes to you in all of your travels!  Sincerest regards, Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary: I loved my stay here.  Rooms were clean and comfortable.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  Loved the breakfast, pancakes were great.  Close to the beach and great shops and restaurants.  Would recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear Kim O,  Thank you very much for staying with us and for your most kind review! We strive for 100% guest satisfaction with every guest and its great to hear we met your expectations. I will gladly share your comments with our team. I do hope that should your travels bring you back to the San Clemente area we will get the opportunity to welcome you back. Thank you again and all my best in your travels!  Sincerest regards, Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary: Pretty nice Hotel, very clean nicely appointed rooms.  There is plenty of parking has a small pool by the entry way. Breakfast is included with a wide variety of selection.  Rooms have good wifi.  Not easy to get to even though visible from freeway. Do not go by GPS as it takes you through a residential area where homeowners have blocked access. So you end up going through the back of a shopping center. For business people it's great because the anchor store is Staples!  My only complain was we originally had a room on the upper floor but a few days before our visit we picked up a stray dog & brought her with us. So we ended up on the lower floor & unfortunately by the elevator. That posed two problems.   People & kids congregate by the elevator. Our first night at one thirty I
Manager Response: Dear socratesa,  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your feedback from your recent stay. I have addressed the noise issue that you mentioned with our team. Your comfort and enjoyment is our top priority. The team will be keeping the door to the laundry closed so the noise levels will be at a minimum. The GPS is something that we are working with Iphone maps to fix their map directions. Google Maps is accurate for your future reference.   We do appreciate your feedback and I do hope should your travels bring you back to area you will give us the opportunity to welcome you back. I look forward to seeing you on your next visit and thank you again!  Sincerest regards, Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary Heading: Awesome place, awesome staff, very satisfied
Summary: After having spent the night at a dreadful Best Western the night before i was so glad to be back where i belong. IHG hotels.  I was greeted with great hospitality by Victor and another gentleman whom i believe was the manager. The room has a nice balcony to enjoy the view of some of the city. Bed was comfortable and breakfast was great. Only downer was no hot tub but with Victors great service and how beautiful the property looked it did not matter in the end. Plus i heard that the pool is heated. My wife and i travel alot and will always continue to stay at IHG hotels. Why try anything else.  Will definitely stay here again if i am in this area.
Manager Response: Dear Bruce8181,  Thank you very much for your kind review and it was myself and Victor that were there when you arrived. It is our pleasure to serve our guests and provide a clean, comfortable and enjoyable home away from home. I will make sure I share your comments with the team as we always like to hear such great feedback from our guests.   Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back to San Clemente!  Sincerest regards, Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary: Nice hotel, clean and comfortable rooms, property nicely maintained, good breakfast, but what truly makes this place shine is the quality of the people who work there. Without exception, the management and staff go out of their way to provide outstanding customer service -- they could not possibly be more polite or accommodating. I am wrapping up a two week stay here, and will be back for several more weeks this summer, on business. Two very big and enthusiastic thumbs up!
Manager Response: Dear Jamey H,  Wow! What a nice review. Your comments are so kind and very much appreciated. I will certainly be sharing your review with the team. I am glad you will be returning to stay with us. Please let me know if you need anything else during your stay so we can make it every bit as good if not better than last time.  Thank you again and I look forward to welcoming you back soon. Sincerest regards, Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary: We were very thankful for early check in. Breakfast had enough choices for our family. Later in the evening the warm cookies were yummy. The pool is heated and not chlorinated, pool towels nearby. Our room was cleaned promptly every day in the morning. The only thing was -where to take a dog for his business, our dog is small so no problem but for a big dog it might be. Love the location.
Manager Response: Dear BennettDavis,  Thank you very much for your kind remarks. I too have a small dog and am actually working on some things to add a little spot for our 4 legged family members. Your review is much appreciated and we love to hear all the great things that happen during our Guests stays. I will make certain to share your comments with the team. I do hope should your travels bring you back to the area you will once again stay with us at the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente. Thank you again! Sincerest regards, Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful place to stay!!  We loved it!
Summary: Just stayed five nights and it could not have been nicer!  Loved the room (very clean), breakfast was wonderful and the nightly chocolate chip cookies are the absolute best (Thanks Tesh).   We visited San Diego, Palm Springs, Joshua Tree National Park, Redondo Beach, Venice Beach, Malibu, and Los Angeles.   Fantastic value for the money.  We would definitely stay again when we come back to San Clemente.
Manager Response: Hi Nancy, Thank you so very much for your most kind review and for your recent stay! We are most appreciative of our guests taking the time to share their positive experiences. We have a great team here that is passionate about taking the best care of our guests. It helps that we are close to the beach and central to so many attractions and places to visit in Southern California.  I look forward to personally welcoming you on your next visit and thank you again for your valued feedback and business!  Sincerest regards, Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary: I have been staying at this property on an extended business trip for the last few months.  It is a very nice property, but it is not located in a walk friendly location.  That would be my only nit to this hotel.  The staff...and I mean everyone on the staff...is fantastic.  From the breakfast room crew, to the cleaning staff, to the front desk crew (in particular Tesh!) have an amazing, customer-centric attitude.  I cannot recommend the staff at this hotel enough.  I travel all over the world on business and this team is top notch.  The breakfast is typical budget buffet.  Nothing special, but adequate to get one started for the day.  If you are looking for a nice, clean, comfortable, affordable location in San Clemente, this property fits the bill.
Manager Response: Dear Triguydenver, Thank you so very much for your most kind review and for your recent stay! I look forward to personally welcoming you on your next visit and thank you again for your valued feedback and business!  Sincerest regards, Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary Heading: Keep left and follow the fence
Summary: Solo female traveler recently stayed here for a 1 night visit.  Pluses for the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente:  1.	Clean, spacious, and beautifully decorated interior 2.	Exceptionally friendly and helpful staff 3.	Full hot breakfast buffet including scrambled eggs, bacon, and biscuits and gravy. 4.	Laundry room available on the 2nd floor 5.	Lovely pool and landscaped surroundings 6.	Excellent Business Center for those of us without the benefit of mobile communication devices 7.     Basketball half court and goal in the parking lot  The one potential minus:  The hotel is not readily visible from Ave Pico and may be a challenge to locate.  Logistics suggestions:  1.	Keep left after turning into the Via Pico Plaza shopping center. 2.	Follow the tall chain link fence on your left
Manager Response: Dear 46Lil,  Thank you very much for the great review and especially for helping our guests locate our hotel. I am glad you enjoyed your visit and do hope the next time you are staying with us you will stop by to say hello.   Sincerest regards,  Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful. It was so nice to walk into a clean hotel room! This is #1 for me. The beds were very comfortable. Close to freeway access. Although we didn't make it to the beach, it is very close. Would definitely recommend!

Summary: Nice three day stay.  Friendly helpful staff and nice, comfortable and clean accommodations.  Good beds and quiet even though it is close to the freeway.  Everything one would expect from an express hotel - no nonsense, user friendly, well kept & efficiently run.  It is tricky to find so you will want to map quest or use google maps, especially for the last few blocks!
Manager Response: Dear Gamefisher2, Thank you very much for your valued business and support of the Holiday Inn Express in San Clemente. Your feedback and kind review are very much appreciated. We are truly grateful for our guests taking the time to provide their feedback and we love to hear when our guests have a great experience. I will make sure that I share your comments with our team.  Thank you again, and I look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the San Clemente area.  Cordially,  Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary Heading: Only good thing about this place was the room was clean.
Summary: We stayed here for a couple days, checked in Sunday evening and checked out Wednesday morning. Wasn't too happy with my stay for several different reasons.  CONS 1. finding this place for the first time was not easy. iPhone maps has you get off at the 1st exit after you pass the hotel. Then it takes you through a windy neighborhood and ends at a dead end where if you look down the hillside you can see the hotel but can't actually drive to it, so I suggest you don't use iPhone maps. ( can be seen directly next to the freeway)  2. We were given the corner room on the top floor, closest to the freeway. Sound of traffic was very loud and could be heard all day and night.  3.They were repaving the road, the only road, that goes up the hill to this place. All was okay at first,
Manager Response: Dear Kim818,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We certainly do our utmost to make your stay comfortable and pleasant and it appears we have fallen short of your expectations. Additionally I would like to extend our apologies for the noise and water in the bathroom. Lastly we were trying our best not to interrupt the traffic flow to our entrance with our refresh of our parking lot so again my apologies. Your comments are important to the success of our hotel, as we rely on you, our guest, to tell us how we are doing and how we can better meet your needs.  Once again, thank you for staying with us and we hope to have an opportunity to serve you again on your next visit.  Sincerest regards,

Manager Response: Dear Sharronw,  Great to hear you loved our Holiday Inn Express in San Clemente!!! That's what we're working towards everyday - to give our guests a wonderful experience. Thank you very much for your most kind comments and review.  We look forward to your next visit to San Clemente - Orange County!  Sincerest regards, Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary: On a whim, I decided to take my daughter to the beach for spring break, inviting my boyfriend to join us with his later in the week. I came across a Groupon for this hotel making my last minute booking quite affordable! Having previously attended a family reunion in San Clemente I was able to confirm with a brother who stayed at this hotel that he recommended it as nice + family friendly. Our adventure began!  The only challenge here happened shortly upon arrival in San Clemente (but it's become a source of laughter). I had plugged the hotel address into my GPS. As we twisted & turned thru small side streets of San Clemente, I remarked that I didn't recall it being so hard to find when my brother stayed there AND thank goodness for GPS as I've never be able to remember this
Manager Response: Dear designermomaz, Thank you very much for selecting the Holiday Inn Express in San Clemente for your recent trip. Your feedback and kind review are very much appreciated. Thank you again, and I look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the San Clemente area.  Cordially,  Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary: I got a Groupon for this hotel and saved about $60.The room was very nice and comfortable.Fully stocked with all the little things that seem to becoming fewer and fewer nowadays.Complimentary bottle water and free hot breakfast...Staff was super nice and hotel was nicely located,.

I look forward to personally welcoming you on your next visit! Thank you again!   Sincerest regards, Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a week, comfortable beds, clean well maintained rooms.  My room décor was dark, even with all the lights on the room was still dark.  I would have given the hotel 5 stars if there was a Jacuzzi in the pool area.  Also, the free breakfast very good except for the turkey sausage (I just don't like turkey sausage).  I would stay here again.

I look forward to personally welcoming you on your next visit. Please feel free to let me know the next time you are planning to visit!  Sincerest regards, Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary: Our staff from San Diego stayed here to a four day workshop academy with our Orange County office.  We made reservations with Sarah Edwards and everything went well.  The hotel has easy access to the freeway.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We loved the time we spent at the HIE in San Clemente; so much, in fact, that we extended our stay an extra night.  Eddy, the desk man at night, worked diligently to assure that our needs were met .  The only downside was that we were visiting L.A. and the drive was too far for our liking.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Having worked as a customer service consultant for Intercontinental Hotels Group, I often trained hotel staff on proper customer service. Allan, Tesh, Victor, Guzy, and Stephanie could easily have taught those classes for me.   They were bulletproof.  - Allan was the epitome of friendly, capable and on point.  - Tesh was approachable and concerned not just about my stay, but me as a person.  - Victor capitalized on his ability to truly hear what I was saying and produced maps of where I needed to go without me asking, and anticipated many of my needs.  - Guzy did her best to convince me that California is the best place on earth, and that I should live there(cutting off their source of revenue, but love for one's home is always appreciated). She also gave me a map of the pier
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked my room through a groupon offer.  Victor gave me directions over the phone and checked us in.  He was courteous and filled us in on the hotels free breakfast.  His friendly attitude made us feel welcomed.   The room was spotless and welcoming.  The morning breakfast was hot and had a few choices.  The cinnamon rolls are outstanding.  Not a far drive to San Juan Capistrano Amtrak, the Mission and a great movie theater in San Juan..  I recommend this hotel to other travelers.  GPS has a hard time locating this hotel because it sits up on a hill behind a strip mall/shopping area.  You may want to call for directions.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I would definitely stay here again!  Clean modern rooms, pet friendly, breakfast buffet included.  This hotel is located about a mile from San Clemente Pier just taking a few minutes by car.  There is an outdoor heated pool in the courtyard, which is a decent size for swimming but the walkway around the pool is a bit narrow, however they've made good use of the space.  Modern wicker chaises, plenty of side tables and fresh towels.  It is a tad bit awkward that the pool is located directly in front of the hotel lobby windows, but its very quaint and a beautiful place for mom and dad to gaze at the stars while the kiddo's are swimming.  The hotel is pet friendly and very clean with a nice sized gym.  Every room has a balcony but you really need to ask for an upper level room
Manager Response: none

Summary: I can't say enough good about this place. I've spent over a month here with another few weeks to go, and I have to be honest that I'll miss it when I leave.  The staff is awesome - Allan, Tesh, & Guzy treat the guests so well. They're great people, extremely helpful, and always open to chat. They've got great recommendations for food & activities as well, so make sure to speak with them for a bit!  The place is well taken care of, quiet, has comfy rooms, & is only 1 mile from the beach.   I recommend this hotel to any type of traveler, and I will definitely stay here again the next time I'm in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Thanks to my company, I was put up in the holiday inn express in san clemente. I completely enjoyed my stay. I'll be here for total of 2 months and couldn't have asked for a better hotel. I recommend the Holiday Inn Express to any type of traveler and when I come to visit with my family, I'll be sure to stay here as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hotel is great but the people are the best!
Summary: I've stayed at this hotel a lot recently due to frequent travel to the area for work and I can honestly say, I've never stayed at a nicer hotel and that's mostly due to the people who work here. The hotel is very clean and very nice (which is great) but the people who run the desk (Allen, Tesh, Victor, Guzi) are far and away the nicest people I've had the pleasure of dealing with in all of hospitality! This would still be a nice hotel were it not for these people, but because of these people I actually look forward to staying here when I travel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I enjoyed my stay here at the Holiday Inn Express.  The hotel was very clean and the staff was very attentive.  The only downside was the 25.00 fee to check in early when I couldn't return to check in until having moved my son in the early evening and really didn't care to haul luggage after having moved all day.  Anyway,  the breakfast was good and asked for a quiet room and it was truly quiet.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Just odd! Odd location, odd staff, odd ocurrances
Summary: The hotel is nice and clean, rooms are up to date and clean. Location is terrible, you have to drive behind a shopping center and up a private hill to get to the hotel. Freeway noise is noticeable. Tried to give us a room next to the elevators and housecleaning/laundry room. Had other customers walk into our room while we're laying in bed. Workers walking by our patio sweeping while we had door open watching tv. Just odd!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback of our hotel.  I am happy to hear that everything was clean and up to date.  Unfirtunately our location is a bit hard to find but we feel once you get here it gives you a sense of isolation.  It is unacceptalbe for our team to disrupt your stay while doing thier maintenance and cleaning and I will be discussing this with them at our next team meeting.  Again thank you for your feedback,

Summary: My wife and I came here to see my son who is stationed at Camp Pendleton and my daughter who lives in Southern Calif.   The hotel is one of the best kept, clean hotels I have been in years. The room was spotless and everyone is very friendly. The beds are comfortable. The front desk staff are great and extremely helpfull and they went out of their way to accommodate my request.  Breakfast was solid and better than most freebies I have had. A little close to the freeway, but if you open your slider just turn on the fan on the air unit and it drowns out the cars or just close the slider and leave the air on.  In all a very, very well kept, very clean hotel and very helpfull staff. And a special thanks to Allen for understanding my sons situation with the military issue.  When we

He thanked me for being a member, for choosing their hotel, and for choosing to use their hotel to redeem my points toward.  He was most accommodating and made every effort to make sure we got the room with specifications we asked for. He really set the tone to our having a nice stay. Our room was comfortable and QUIET!  I got a great night's sleep.  The breakfaast was nice and as the staff person was getting ready to refill the coffee carafe, she noticed I wanted more and poured me coffee before she filled the carafe. They are so kind and helpful and always have smiles on their faces. I stayed at this hotel for 3 weeks in December and am ending a 4 week stay in January, and I can honestly say that I have made some new friends! Looking forward to my next stay

The hotel is very clean, it's comfortable, the breakfast is always good and it's only a half mile from the beach!  Everyone is very accommodating and they always great us by name with a smile when we arrive from a hard day at work.  I highly recommend you staying here!

I have stayed in this hotel for several weeks, and Allan, Victor, Tesh, Gose, and everyone go above and beyond to take care of us in every way.  From minor requests like toiletries, to bigger things such as outfitting us for beach trips (sunscreen and chairs!), to hooking us up with a gas grill so we can cook on the patio, the staff has been cheerful and accommodating at all times.  I have traveled pretty extensively for business in my career and I can honestly say that this is the best hotel experience i have had.  Thanks to all the staff who have made this possible.

Summary: This hotel is ok, but the major let down was our bathroom that resembled a public restroom in a park, that was just too bizarre! There was no place to put your toiletries, every time I walked in I felt like some random stranger was about to knock on the door to use the restroom! The location is also pretty awful, it is right off the freeway and located on a hillside behind a strip mall. We requested a Lyft and the driver who works in the area had trouble finding the place. Check in was rather odd as well. The front desk is unmanned, occasionally, someone who works in another section of the hotel comes by to see if anyone needs some assistance. Other than that, for 75 a night it was decent.

Allow me to sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced at check in and with some of our bathroom amenities. I have taken note of your comments and rest assured that this will be considered when making the necessary improvements.   Although I would have preferred you had a better stay, I thank you again for your feedback. I hope that you will give us another chance to serve you better in the future.  Sincerely,  Faith R Case Manager IHGCare

I left my room at noon to pick lunch at the nearby Chipotle and on my way out asked the front staff if housekeeping could clean my room while I was away. I am back 45 min later and I find my room spotless clean. Now that is service. Well done Holiday Inn!

I would definitely stay here again next time in San Clemente or even when visiting Dana Point.

Summary Heading: Our Stay at Holiday Inn Express-Superb!

The property was one of the best located for access and exit to main corridors, and one of the cleanest and well managed hotels I've ever visited. The most notable part of experience was the service. The Front Office Manager, Ms Guzy

Good breakfast choices with a pancake maker!  Loved sitting outside under an umbrella for my ride each morning!  Great staff that really was helpful.  Kinda hard to find the first time, but worth the seclusion! Only thing missing was a bar for afternoon cocktails.  I will stay again!

Once you find it --situated awkwardly above a shopping center & hemmed in by Interstate 5-- you'll feel like you've stumbled upon a cozy, quaint oasis where you least expected to find one. Very reasonably priced, the place is managed with top-notch professionalism, and the friendly staff seems genuinely glad to see you. The pool area's nice, though I wish it had a jacuzzi. Otherwise, all conditions are conducive to a relaxing, worry-free stay.

No car needed everything is walking distance away. Staff is really so easy going and never saw one frown. Smiles all the time.  On location Easy fast breakfast served to get the day doing just right and enjoy this beach town to it's fullest!!!

Three levels - we got the 1st floor which is the bottom floor of the property.  You can hear every single footstep from the above floor. I did alert the front desk gentlemen and he took care of telling them to get back into their rooms - kudos to him. Despite this, and the hotel being fully booked the staff did all they could to help me find alternative accommodation on what was a very busy weekend. It was much appreciated.

Summary Heading: A Great Place with Classy Service!
Summary: This hotel is beautifully situated on a hill, like a resort.  But the real value is in its Manager, Guzy Johnson and her able staff.  My cousin who was staying there got sick and I flew in from the East Coat to help him.  Before I got there, my cousin's condition worsened, and he needed medical care.   Ms. Johnson not only arranged for my cousin's move to a hospital, but also treated him with compassion and dignity.  She didn't push my sick cousin to pay the bill when he was moved; but waited for me to arrive and pay for the room.  She also refrained from charging for the days the room could not be let out, and declined to accept extra payment for cleaning the room.  That was classy.     Vijay Rajan Silver Spring, Maryland

The location was surprisingly remote being so close to every thing one would need. The spot eliminated cross traffic and foot traffic which made for a nice , quite eight day stay, and let's not forget breakfast...WOW! I've stayed at the Ritz Carlton and was happier here for breakfast. I had every thing I needed and it was free- not a $120 a breakfast like a the other place. The pancake machine was incredible. I'm now getting one for my home. This place will be an annual trip for us for sure! Next time my little dog comes as he's welcome.

Every accommodation requested is catered to in the most expeditious manner with a friendly smile by the accommodating staff. I don't know what the negative review about the breakfast was about- the front desk has always been well informed and knowledgable about the property and local area. Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our customer service and housekeeping team.  The data "jack pack" we have under the televisions is a great tool for a traveler and I am glad to hear it got some use.

Manager Response: none

Most of us had reservations and the staff , particularly Steven was most helpful in getting us into our rooms early to get ready for the wedding. We did not see too many other families with small children, and felt like we needed to be ultra quiet because of it.

Being located only a blink from the interstate and approx five minutes from the beaches we didn't hear a single car drive by and started relaxing immediately.  The beds were comfortable and the mattresses new. The bathroom was small, but not too small and clean to the edges.  Our room was equipped with a TV, microwave and a refrigerator - only thing we had been missing was a in-room safe.  The rates where pretty much reasonable for what we got! All in all, it couldn't be better! If you want to stay in San Clemente for a few days, choose the HI express!

No chairs on our VERY small balcony. A "one nighter" at best passing through the area would be my recommendation.
