Summary: The weekend (October 12-14) could not have been better.  Neel, Hiren, Guza, and Eddie were helpful and cooperative beyond words; "our slightest wish was their command!"  The accommodations were superb--extremely clean and comfortable--and their ballroom/meeting rooms were exactly what we needed.  I give this hotel an A++ in the way they welcomed us and accommodated our annual Fall Gathering
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed at the hotel numerous times in the past year.  The staff is always professional and friendly.  Rooms are neat and clean.  I am greeted by name which is a nice touch and I don't feel like a number. The breakfast is good with a wide variety of selections and the attendant never fails to ask if I need anything.  Too bad there isn't a 6 star rating or I would give it.
Manager Response: Yes we are very exctited to be the #1 rated hotel in San Clemente on Tripadvisor.  We work very hard to give our guests the best service possible.  A special thank you to guests like you who appreciated our service and are willing to write your great reviews on Tripadvisor!  Thank you.

Summary: Best holiday inn I have ever stayed at. Came down for work and it was my first time in san clemente. Neel guided me with list of good resturants and directions to different parts of the city. His customer service is by far the best one I have ever come accross. I gave him my card if he ever needs an opportunity to grow . I am planning a vacation and will be coming back in dec. Neel thank you for everything.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Have stayed here a few times as my son is stationed at Camp Pendleton. Guzy, Neel, Sara & Hoeon go out of thier way to make it a pleasurable trip each time. Everyone is friendly and helpful. Centrally located to all areas. Clean rooms and ample parking. Breakfast in the morning, internet and the staff will help with any questions.  I needed information on another location for Nov. Neel went beyond and got me a great rate and reservations. Even called and sent me the icomfirmation information.  Plan on booking here again when I am in the area. Thanks Neel, Guzy, Hoeon, & Sara
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind words about our Team.  We strive to deliver the best Customer Service and it is nice to know that our hard work is paying off.  Your comments will be shared with the team so they know they are doing a great job and it is being noticed.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Clean smart and economical hotel in San Clemente!
Summary: Love the location and hotel is in sweet spot for San Clemente!  The staff is polite, smiles and very helpful.  Guzy at the front desk make a point on asking about room and service.  We are booking here again in December.  Great for kids also. Alan from Mill Valley
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff was professional, very helpful and extremely nice.  The front desk clerk remembered we were there for a family affair and asked each time we saw her how we were enjoying our family get-together.  She also always asked if there was anything we needed.  The other clerks were just as nice, and the maid was very nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Came to stay here to stay for a sporting event and shocked how nice this place was. staff is super nice and friendly. Sara and neel helped us make the reservations. Staff is very nice and friendly! Amazing place with a cozy feel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I do agree that our Sales Team of Sarah and Neel are outstanding and I am glad they made your stay enjoyable.  Your comments will be shared with them as they always like to hear they are doing a good job.  Thank you.

Summary: Easy access to and from freeway..Great,friendly,and helpful staff...Guzalla,Neal and Hiren were the best! Great breakfast and superior air conditioning in the rooms.Close to the beach...Can't wait to come back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Easy access to and from freeway..Great,friendly,and helpful staff...Guzalla,Neal and Hiren were the best! Great breakfast and superior air conditioning in the rooms.Close to the beach...Can't wait to come back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beat place to stay in SC!
Summary: Never stayed at a holiday inn express which is this clean and beautiful. The architecture is beautiful with super clean rooms and utmost friendly staff. Sales department helped us and very nice. We were with a wedding party and Neel made life easyyy! He was very helpfull in every aspect off our experience. Making reservations was smooth, proper direction were provided by him for in town facilities and always smiling. I never knew this place exist until I was told to make reservations here. Please keep up the good work!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel!  We appreciate the feedback and it is always nice to hear we are doing a good job.  Neel is a huge asset to ther property and your kind words will be shared with him.  We look forward to you visiting again the next time you are in South Orange County.

Summary: Stayed here a couple of times. No frills, but clean, comfortable and a good experience. The breakfast is "ok', but don't expect too much and you won't be disappointed. Definitely be happy to stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was in San Clemente for a wedding and stayed at this hotel for a week. I really didn't want to leave. The hotel was comfortable, the location was great and the staff were very courteous and helpful.  I loved being able to go out and run each morning and get to the beach within 10-15 mins. There was a good breakfast buffet each morning. The only criticism I would make is that the lighting in the room could have been better. I don't like the energy saving bulbs that have to be used in CA now and the bulbs could have been a little brighter. I will stay here again next time I am in San Clemente. The front desk staff Hiren, Guzy and Shivpal were EXCELLENT and extremely helpful when needed.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We previously  stayed at this location before it was "remodeled" and turned into a Holiday Inn Express.  They should have remodeled the ceilings and floors; we had to hear loud walking all night long and early in the morning.  Our room was on the same level as the lobby and looked out on dead plants.  We were grateful that we didn't have to be on the freeway side like we have had to do in the past.  The tiny, cramped bathroom was the same as before the "remodel".  The  "complimentary" breakfast consisted of a host of plastic, unappetizing food (omelets made with atrocious salty orange cheese in the center), slices of lunchmeat-type ham, sickening sweet mini sweet rolls displayed in their bake-in-their carton container, margarine  instead of butter for toast, etc., etc., The
Manager Response: I really sorry to hear about your experience on your recent stay. We understand you were not impressed with some aspects of your last stay. I just wanted to remind you that we are always working out situations like this and you are more than welcome to let us know immediately when this happen, maybe we could move you to a different room, more isolated from noises. Regarding the breakfast, it's what the brand provides, and the food is always fresh. There are plans to expand the offer and have more low carb item as a standard for our brand. Please let us know if you would like to be contacted and arrange something for your next stay, give us the opportunity to rectify what we did wrong, all we ask is a chance to do so. Feel free to contact us.  Ricardo Mongi - General Manager

Summary: I have been to this hotel four times in the past  nine months for business. The front desk staff are friendly and helpful with all my needs. This hotel is convenient to lots of attractions and nearby cities for entertainment. I will continue to stay here for business and vacation in San Clemente.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 7 nights.  The hotel is in a quiet location and is a short drive to area restaurants, shops and the beach.  The rooms are clean and comfortable and the hotel is nicely maintained.  The front desk staff was exceptional (especially Hiren, Guzy and Shivpal).  They were very accomodating and friendly and were truly interested in making sure we had a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review! And yes, we are blessed with some of the friendlist staff you'll find in any hotel, they rock!

Summary: Liked this hotel. Good breakfast in the morning. It's hidden within a strip mall which is unusual, but close to San Clemente village with good eateries. Nice pier close by to view sunset. Ate at Dukes, fish n chips moist. The pool is small, but good enough. Beds very comfortable, with efficient AC.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience! Happy to hear you had a good time.

Summary: We stayed just one night this time, but the staff was so accommodating as we had to cut our trip short.  Wonderful breakfast, manicured grounds, very clean rooms.  A bit noisey with the door open as I-5 is just above.  No traffic noise when slider is shut.  We like staying there as very convenient for visiting our friends. Will stay again as the staff is first class.
Manager Response: Thank you for this friendly review! We hope to welcome you again the next time you're in the area.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, nice staff, paper thin walls.
Summary: We stayed a couple nights here recently.  We were very impressed by the overall cleanliness of the hotel and the friendliness and cooperation of the staff.  The first night we stayed on the second floor and were promptly greeted by our neighbors having sex.  It's as if there was no wall at all.  Then, we were awoken by what appeared to be a herd of animals at 2 am.  This same herd reconvened at 6 am.  To be fair, the front desk promptly moved us to the last room on the third floor and the second night was pure bliss.  Couldn't even hear any noise from the I-5.  The breakfast was a nice touch, but VERY busy in the mornings.  Mostly processed foods, but it did the job.  We may return, and if we do, I will definitely be sure it's a room on the 3rd floor.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay with children
Summary: This is our second time staying at this hotel. The location is close to the beach. They have several places to eat close by.The hotel is clean and the pool is heated. The front desk employees are friendly and always willing to help. They also have a great breakast so we saved money by eating before we headed to the beach. We would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you!

Summary: We arrived late at night and left early the next morning, so not much chance to evaluate overall service but the room has one of the nicest decors I've been in comparing the Holiday Inn chain and the Hilton Garden Inn, where we stayed earlier during our trip.  Updated with dark walls and furniture, bed and chairs were comfortable.  The bathroom was beautiful with it's marble floors and granite countertop.  We even had a small balcony.  The pool is small and the breakfast area was very busy but well maintained.  Location right off the expressway but it is a little tricky because you have to drive into a shopping center.  We were there on July 1st so the hotel was filled with family travelers but everything from check in to check out  and the complimentary breakfast was handled
Manager Response: Thank you! Glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary Heading: A bit pricey, but clean and quiet.
Summary: Im always a bit skeptical of lodgings that are near a freeway, but was pleasantly surprised by the hotel. Staff was friendly, even though we checked in very late, rooms looked like they were recently remodeled, and very quiet! A bit pricey, but then again, summertime rates near a beach community will do that. Small pool, comfy rooms, friendly staff...!
Manager Response: Thank you!

Summary Heading: Nice place but avoid first floor rooms
Summary: Rented a room for the 4th of July and was for the most part happy with the hotel. Rooms were spacious and clean. Service, speedy and friendly.  Location was decent with main part of town just a couple of miles away. Beds were very comfortable, free wifi and breakfast a plus, but my only recommendation would be to avoid rooms on the first floor of the hotel which actually is underground. In the morning, we were awoken by a loud squeaking ceiling. It almost sounded like our roof would cave in. As upstairs traffic increased so did the noise. Now I don't know if all rooms on the first floor have this problem, but I would avoid them altogether. Overall, a nice property.
Manager Response: I apologize for the noise problems you encountered during your stay, that is certainly not the norm for our hotel, no matter what floor. I am glad you enjoyed your stay in general, and I hope to be able to welcome you back in the future.

Summary Heading: If you are a smoker don't stay here !!!
Summary: Nice clean rooms, good free breakfast. Would not be my choice next time due to their smoking policies.
Manager Response: Per brand requirement, our property is 100% non-smoking. I apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you.

Summary: We needed a place to stay for one night while visiting family in nearby Dana Point.  We found this hotel to be a very nice place, clean and comfortable and the hotel staff was very nice and accommodating.  They also had a very nice morning breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you, we're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: This was our second several-day stay at the HI Express, San C North.  We were impressed last summer, especially with the staff.  To our surprise this year, most of them were still there! (HI, Guzi)  They are exceptionally accommodating and pleasant.  It's a very well maintained property with a Southwestern adobe style.  It has a nice feeling to it, overall.  The location was excellent:  a short drive to downtown and the beach; close to shopping needs; nestled off by itself on a hill; quiet.  The ONLY negative seemed to be the reading lights.  The bulbs are the curly ones and not adequate for reading.  We have been going to San C for many years.  We hope to continue to stay at this HI Express in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review! We all love our hotel, no reason to leave. :)

Summary: My husband and I stayed here about 2 weeks ago. It was a last minute trip to san clemente to get away from our regular life. The hotel is located in a small shopping center but is very quite!! I had spoken to a guy name Neel on the phone while I was making a reservations. Surprisingly when we got to the hotel Neel was the one who checked us in! He is probably one of the nicest person we have met! He gave us options on where we would like our room to be to going out of the way and helping my husband with his luggage which is not expected as Holiday Inn Express is not a full serivce facility. I have to say he is one the key people why this hotel stay was not ok but more like FANTASTIC! To the owners/managment, you have onbe of the best employees and we will return for sure just
Manager Response: Wow, thank you for taking the time to share your experience! Yes, Neel is probably one of the nicest guys around, and we'll be sure to recognize him for a job well done!

Summary: I was in town for a week long training. My wife accompanied on the trip. We highly recommend this hotel. The customer service set this place far apart from other hotels. Every staff member was friendly and every time we walked by the front desk we were acknowledged. The room was nice and clean. If I visit San Clemente again I will surely be staying at the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente North. Breakfast was nice and the hotel is even within walking distance of the beach (1.2 miles).
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review!

Summary: We arrived without a reservation since we didn't realize we would be spending a few nights.  The hotel was almost filled to capacity but the staff was very helpful and professional.  Our room was excellent, clean, and comfortable.  The complimentary breakfast was very nice and a bonus, the parking was ample, and the entire property looked very clean and well maintained.  The location is very convenient to everything in or near San Clemente.  We will definitely stay here again. Valencia Lady
Manager Response: Thank you! Glad to hear that you had a great stay!

Summary Heading: Special Pricing Made this Hotel a Good Deal
Summary: We were part of a reunion group so the rate we paid for this hotel was $108 including taxes etc. for two of us. It was worth that price for a prime time, middle of summer, southern california hotel room. The room was clean, new and the amenities were good. Small refrig is always a plus. It was also quiet and perfect for the one night stay.  Our group also used the hospitality room as a meeting place. It was nice and spacious and I don't know what the charge for it was, but it was smelly like mold. They need to air that room out!
Manager Response: I have to apologize for the smell in your meeting room, that certainly isn't the norm for our property. We'll check if there is a problem with the AC or if we simply forgot to open the doors to air it out that one day, either way, thank you for letting us know! I am glad to hear that you had an otherwise good stay at our hotel.

Summary: We stayed there for two nights.  Room at first look seemed descent but no where near the quality of rooms we've stayed at for less money with a better location. The halls were noisy all night with doors slamming, people partying and toilets flushing above us all night. I expected my toiletries to b refilled the next morning, but they did not.  We booked the room on their website, but my sister booked it on priceline for 1/2 the price. There was also a mix up with check out and somebody had a key to our room and walked in!  Good thing we were there and had to rekey our card at the front desk.  If u want to pay too much for a hotel- this is the one for u.
Manager Response: I regret to hear about your recent stay at our hotel - there is certainly no excuse for the lapse in service you have received and I have to apologize for that. Please rest assured that we have forwarded your comments to management, and we will look into the issue so that we can avoid similar problems in the future. Again, I apologize for your experience, and I hank you for bringing this to our attention.

Summary: I have to start by saying, whatever aromatherapy they're piping into the lobby is working...you're instantly at ease when you walk in the lobby doors. Didn't use the pool but it looked very clean and well maintained. Our private balcony looked out toward the freeway, but the inn is set far enough up the hill that traffic noise was nearly nonexistent. Parking was convenient and plentiful. Very short drive to multiple beautiful beaches. Super clean and comfortable room! We were very happy with our stay here and would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review! It was probably the smell of freshly baked cookies that put you at ease, at least that's what always does it for me.

Summary: I return here every time that I come to work at San Onofre Nuclear Generating Station.  I have been here for a total of  64 nights since March 1, 2012.  The prime reason for this selection is the professional, courteous and cheerful staff.  They have become like family.  I am awakened n time and if I do not show up, theu call again. They tell me if I left my auto window down.  The roomw are kept immaculate and the beds are made up in my taste, w/o the heavy down comforter.  They store some of my clothes when I go home for the wknd.  They make business travelling much more effective.  The breakfast is friendly and useful.  The staff in the kitchen are very helpful even thought I am one of the first down in the AM.  Please single out Hiren, Neel, Guzy and Marina for commendation.
Manager Response: Hi Donald,  Wow, thank you for this wonderful review, and for making the Holiday Inn Express your home away from home when doing business at SONGS. And you are right, our staff is beyond amazing - we'll be sure to recognize them for a job well done.  Thank you, your team from the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente

Summary: This place is great! when was the last time you saw marble tile in the entry way of a Holiday Inn express! also in the bathroom...staff is great... Beds are clean...TV is new..outstanding Value here.. Being a platuim Holiday Inn Member and travel for a living you will not find any better..Stay here..
Manager Response: Thank you!

Summary: My family and I spent Memorial Day weekend at Holiday Inn in San Clemente and I must say that it was one of the most pleasant travel experiences we have had! My husband happens to be one of the most difficult people to please and he was so happy he went and bought a thank you card for the young lady at the front desk. We were in town for a softball tournament and our entire team stayed here and everbody was very happy. The rooms were super clean, the staff was very friendly and they had a "guest laundry room" which we loved. The breakfast was good (not just dry cereal), and the beach is just down the street! Needless to say, this is a place I would definately revisit.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Once you find it, you are good to go.
Summary: This is a very nice hotel. It is right on the interstate but hard to find. Even thought it is close to the highway, noise is not an issue. The hotel is very well done. The rooms were standard but nice. The free breakfast was fine. It had a nice pool/bar area that is right off the lobby. I would think this would be a nice hotel to stay in if doing business in the area. For some reason the night we stay it was empty but I don’t think this is the norm.  I its only a 4 mile run to the ocean and Del Taco close by so what is not to love!
Manager Response: Your Del Taco comment made me chuckle because while there are plenty of great dining options in the area, sometimes a gooey bean and cheese burrito is really the best thing in the world. I've been there. Anyway, thank you for the review and we hope to welcome you back in the future!

Summary: The rooms are well maintained, clean and quiet. Management and staff are polite, friendly and helpful. A hot continental breakfast is available. Location is slightly remote but ok for travel anywhere in San Clemente or environs via interstate 5. Nice pool and well maintained exterior and parking lot.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: An amazing place - not just for stopping by!
Summary: The Holiday Inn Express Hotel San Clemente is directly located to the highway US 5, but the rooms are calm and the whole atmosphere is comfortable.  The manager was really pleased to find the perfect room for us. So, we got a room from where we had an ocean view. Both Dana Point and Laguna Beach are near by.  Corona del mar is not that far as well!
Manager Response: Thank you! Glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: Not bad, but a little obscure.
Summary: I was there in April, 2012 on a car-tour of the PCH, didn't hate it, but didn't love it, either.  While near the highway (good), it was way past the back of a mid-scale shopping plaza and hard to find (bad).  It was clean, orderly, well managed and even had a little pool which no one used.  The bed and bath were of average size and OK.  Everything was pretty clean.  Bed was good.  While we were drawn (a bit) by its free b'fast offer, that was rather poor.  I've seldom tasted worse scrambled eggs which looked and acted much like pebbles on a beach; they need help!  The pastries were much like we experienced up the coast:  old, stiff and refrigerated. The Chinese/Vietnamese restaurant within the plaza was OK for dinner and reasonably priced.  All in all, it was OK but for its
Manager Response: Dear footsore2,  Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay with us. We are pleased you liked your room accommodations.  We work very hard to ensure our facilities and service are superior and we strive to be the best Holiday Inn Express around. It sounds like we fell below your expectations with regards to our food quality.  We have taken note and wish to thank you for all your valuable comments.  These are of great importance to us and allow us to monitor and improve our service continually.  We take all reviews positive and negative very seriously, and your feedback will help us improve for our next guest or your next visit.  Sincerely, Bon V Case Manager IHGCare

Summary: I've posted a few other reviews of hotels in San Clemente CA.  As a way to manage my costs, I'm looking for best value.  This hotel has the best value for me.  i stayed at another Inn in San Clemente and this one is the best for me.  While there could be more freeway noise, if you ask for a room away from the freeway, it can't be heard.  Rooms are clean, updated, and well appointed.  The staff has been very friendly.  This has the best breakfast.  The eggs are good and do not taste powered, a real plus for me.  They even have a pancake maker.  You will need to follow directions as its a little out of the way.  I've stayed here about 4 times in as many weeks and plan to return next week
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review! We are looking forward to see you again next week!

Summary: They thought of everything.  Easy access to rooms and very clean.  Loved that there was NO SMOKING ANYWHERE!  Breakfast had great choices.
Manager Response: Thank you!

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay. Close to freeway but no noise problems. Guzy and Neel were very helpfull!!
Summary: Excellent place to stay. Close to freeway but no noise problems. Guzy and Neel were very helpfull!!
Manager Response: Thank you! And yes, Guzy and Neel are the best!

Summary: Staff & rate was great!!  Rooms were very clean, this Holiday Inn was able to accommodate both our softball teams with 25 rooms only one week b/4 our stay in March-2012.  They also had continental breakfast ready for our girls at 6am!!  Great stay!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you! We enjoyed having you here!

Summary: Beautifully updated room appears newly remodeled, and comes with a balcony.  Very nicely appointed with lots of unexpected extras. Would recommend it overall, with just one complaint about the noisy exhaust fan that accompanies the bathroom light.   Wish they would extend time for breakfast, as we awoke late and had to hurry to eat by 9:30.
Manager Response: Hi Mark, Thank you for this great review! I have made a note about the bathroom fans and the breakfast hours - we always appreciate feedback from our guests so we can improve our product and procedures.

Summary: I've stayed here a handful of times and never had a single problem. The rooms are nicely decorated and the beds are extremely comfortable. Continental breakfest was deluxe (hard-boiled & scrambled eggs, waffles, bagels, yogurt, fruit) and they have warm chocolate chip cookies in the afternoon. This hotel is right off the highway, so don't expect to hear the ocean at night! Make sure you visit downtown San Clemente - it's one of prettiest towns in Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review! And yes, we agree, San Clemente visitors should definitely check out the downtown area around Avenida Del Mar with its unique shops and great dining options.

Summary: We stayed one night at this property,  Dec 2011, and without a GPS, it   may have been hard to find; but well worth the search!          Once found, the building was of spanish style, and our first floor room had a fridge, micro,coffemaker, contemporary furnishing  and lovely marble/granite counter tops and flooring. Altho close to the freeway, our room was very quiet and comfortable. The included breakfast  was good;had ample items, both hot and cold. The  on- demand pancake maker was fun!  We will definitely recommend this prorperty, and look forward to  staying here in the future!                All  staff members were friendly, courteous and helpful when needed. Thank you Kathy Weiss for the courtesy!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience! We appreciate the recommendations, and look forward to welcoming you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel, great location and even better prices.
Summary: We won this hotel through pricelines name your own price and got a great deal.  The hotel is in a beautiful spanish style building in a great location in San Clemente.  Although it was close to the freeway, we asked for a room far away from it and didnt hear any noise from our room.  Our room had a nice balcony, fridge and microwave.  Parking is free and it also comes with a free breakfast, which was decent.  Our room was very clean and the beds were very comfy.  The staff was excellent and accomidating to our every request.  We will definately stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Our hostess was very friendly and welcoming. The room was clean and comfortable. The only drawback was the free breakfast. Parts of if were pretty unappetizing.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Don't be confused that this is a resort, but a good clean place to sleep.  The service is friendly, although the location is a bit obscure as you wind through a strip mall parking lot to gain access to the hotel.  But it's quite adequate for visiting Camp Pendleton, doing business, visiting family/friends or on your way to somewhere else.  Still, the parking/WI FI/ newspaper/simple breakfast are all free.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: The property is beautiful, almost like a mission on a hill.  Lobby is all remodeled and they offer a free breakfast very similar to other hotels.  The room was large, but had a strong bad smell.  Even with sliding door open all night, still had a strong smell.  We booked the room through an internet booking agency.  When we brought it up to clerk, she said we couldn't get an upgrade on this service.  I was not aware a decent smelling room was an upgrade.  The rest of the staff was courteous and helpful.  The hotel was less than half full that  night.  Overall I would try elsewhere.  Any hotel can have an off room, but  front desk person should have been courteous and willing to help with this.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything was great from the check in to the check out.  The breakfast was excellent and the room was clean.The staff was extremely helpful and friendly.  When visiting my son at Camp Pendelton we will always make our reservation here.
Manager Response: Thank you for this friendly review, Denise! We are looking forward to see you again at your next Camp Pendleton visit.

Summary: My experience from beginning to end was very positive.  Kuddo's to Guzy Johnson the front desk supervisor for all of her help from getting me exactly the right room (I'm a light sleeper) and for just being super cheerful everyday. The entire staff was most cooperative, if you needed anything at all they were  more than happy to accomodate you.  The hotel is conveniently located close to the beach and major attractions.  You get free wi fi, and breakfast so it's quite a good deal.  In addition each day your room will be replenished with facial wipes, shampoo, conditioner, body gel and lotion.    There is a very clean exercise room if you like to work out each day.  Be advised it's cardio equipment only.  Each piece comes with its' own TV which is a nice plus.  Overall you cannot
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and we'll be sure to recognize Guzy for a job well done.   We hope to be able to welcome you back again soon.  Sincerely,  your team from the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many times for many extended business trips and I will never stay anywhere else.  The rooms are large, and clean.  there is ample well lit parking.  And the location provides several great resturants in walking distance.  Most importantly the staff is extremely friendly and will ensure all your needs are met.
Manager Response: Thank you, Brian, for this great review!   We are looking forward to welcome you back again on future trips to the area!  Sincerely, your team from the Holiday Inn Express San Clemente

Summary: The property has been fully renovated.  The rooms are spacious and well appointed.  You get all of the quality you'd expect from regular Holiday Inn at an Express price. Most of the staff were wonderful.  The sole exception was a miserable night clerk.  Parking in the upper lot can be an issue.  We were there on a weekend.  There were several boats and RVs in the lot each taking up more than one space and forcing us to park in the lower lot.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: My "go to" hotel in San Clemente
Summary: I stay at this hotel whenever I have to do business on the north side of Camp Pendleton.  The hotel is clean and pretty quiet but a little old and dated.  They have a hot continental breakfast every morning.  It's the exact same food they serve at every Holiday Inn Express (cafeteria quality) but it's hot and it's free so I'll let you make your own decision on whether this is a perk or not.  One bad thing about the hotel is its location.  It's hidden back behind a strip mall so it is a quiet location but there is virtually nothing to walk to in the vicinity.    The one thing that sets this hotel apart is their front desk staff.  They are absolutely outstanding.  They are friendly and personable and remember me by name.  I usually end up having a conversation with whoever is at
Manager Response: none
